{Di2015NewLine          program.startButton,Di2015NewLine          program.cancelButton,Di2015NewLine          program.progressBarDi2015NewLine        },Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    program.startButton.Click += program.startButton_Click;Di2015NewLine    program.cancelButton.Click += program.cancelButton_Click;Di2015NewLine    Application.Run(form);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Button startButton;Di2015NewLine  public Button cancelButton;Di2015NewLine  public ProgressBar progressBar;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private CancellationTokenSource cancellationTokenSource;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void startButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.startButton.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine    this.cancelButton.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    this.cancellationTokenSource = new CancellationTokenSource();Di2015NewLine    var cancellationToken = this.cancellationTokenSource.Token;Di2015NewLine    var progressReporter = new ProgressReporter();Di2015NewLine    var task = Task.Factory.StartNew(() =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for (int i = 0; i != 100; ++i)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        // Check for cancellationDi2015NewLine        cancellationToken.ThrowIfCancellationRequested();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread.Sleep(30); // Do some work.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Report progress of the work.Di2015NewLine        progressReporter.ReportProgress(() =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          // Note: code passed to "ReportProgress" may access UI elements.Di2015NewLine          this.progressBar.Value = i;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Uncomment the next line to play with error handling. Di2015NewLine      //throw new InvalidOperationException("Oops..."); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // The answer, at last! Di2015NewLine      return 42;Di2015NewLine    }, cancellationToken);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // ProgressReporter can be used to report successful completion,Di2015NewLine    //  cancelation, or failure to the UI thread. Di2015NewLine    progressReporter.RegisterContinuation(task, () =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // Update UI to reflect completion. Di2015NewLine      this.progressBar.Value = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Display results. Di2015NewLine      if (task.Exception != null)Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Background task error: " + task.Exception.ToString());Di2015NewLine      else if (task.IsCanceled)Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Background task cancelled");Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("Background task result: " + task.Result);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // Reset UI. Di2015NewLine      this.progressBar.Value = 0;Di2015NewLine      this.startButton.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine      this.cancelButton.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  private void cancelButton_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.cancellationTokenSource.Cancel();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3254794Di2015UniqueSeparatorProgressReporter
3254794Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary> Di2015NewLine/// A class used by Tasks to report progress or completion updates back to the UI. Di2015NewLine/// </summary> Di2015NewLinepublic sealed class ProgressReporterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// The underlying scheduler for the UI's synchronization context. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  private readonly TaskScheduler scheduler;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="ProgressReporter"/> class. This should be run on a UI thread. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  public ProgressReporter()Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.scheduler = TaskScheduler.FromCurrentSynchronizationContext();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Gets the task scheduler which executes tasks on the UI thread. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  public TaskScheduler SchedulerDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    get { return this.scheduler; }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Reports the progress to the UI thread. This method should be called from the task. Note that the progress update is asynchronous with respect to the reporting Task. For a synchronous progress update, wait on the returned <see cref="Task"/>. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to perform in the context of the UI thread. Note that this action is run asynchronously on the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The task queued to the UI thread.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task ReportProgressAsync(Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return Task.Factory.StartNew(action, CancellationToken.None, TaskCreationOptions.None, this.scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Reports the progress to the UI thread, and waits for the UI thread to process the update before returning. This method should be called from the task. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to perform in the context of the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  public void ReportProgress(Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    this.ReportProgressAsync(action).Wait();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Registers a UI thread handler for when the specified task finishes execution, whether it finishes with success, failiure, or cancellation. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="task">The task to monitor for completion.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to take when the task has completed, in the context of the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The continuation created to handle completion. This is normally ignored.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task RegisterContinuation(Task task, Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return task.ContinueWith(_ => action(), CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.None, this.scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Registers a UI thread handler for when the specified task finishes execution, whether it finishes with success, failiure, or cancellation. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <typeparam name="TResult">The type of the task result.</typeparam> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="task">The task to monitor for completion.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to take when the task has completed, in the context of the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The continuation created to handle completion. This is normally ignored.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task RegisterContinuation<TResult>(Task<TResult> task, Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return task.ContinueWith(_ => action(), CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.None, this.scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Registers a UI thread handler for when the specified task successfully finishes execution. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="task">The task to monitor for successful completion.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to take when the task has successfully completed, in the context of the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The continuation created to handle successful completion. This is normally ignored.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task RegisterSucceededHandler(Task task, Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return task.ContinueWith(_ => action(), CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion, this.scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Registers a UI thread handler for when the specified task successfully finishes execution and returns a result. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <typeparam name="TResult">The type of the task result.</typeparam> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="task">The task to monitor for successful completion.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to take when the task has successfully completed, in the context of the UI thread. The argument to the action is the return value of the task.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The continuation created to handle successful completion. This is normally ignored.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task RegisterSucceededHandler<TResult>(Task<TResult> task, Action<TResult> action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return task.ContinueWith(t => action(t.Result), CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnRanToCompletion, this.Scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Registers a UI thread handler for when the specified task becomes faulted. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="task">The task to monitor for faulting.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to take when the task has faulted, in the context of the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The continuation created to handle faulting. This is normally ignored.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task RegisterFaultedHandler(Task task, Action<Exception> action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return task.ContinueWith(t => action(t.Exception), CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnFaulted, this.Scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Registers a UI thread handler for when the specified task becomes faulted. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <typeparam name="TResult">The type of the task result.</typeparam> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="task">The task to monitor for faulting.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to take when the task has faulted, in the context of the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The continuation created to handle faulting. This is normally ignored.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task RegisterFaultedHandler<TResult>(Task<TResult> task, Action<Exception> action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return task.ContinueWith(t => action(t.Exception), CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnFaulted, this.Scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Registers a UI thread handler for when the specified task is cancelled. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="task">The task to monitor for cancellation.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to take when the task is cancelled, in the context of the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The continuation created to handle cancellation. This is normally ignored.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task RegisterCancelledHandler(Task task, Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return task.ContinueWith(_ => action(), CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnCanceled, this.Scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary> Di2015NewLine  /// Registers a UI thread handler for when the specified task is cancelled. Di2015NewLine  /// </summary> Di2015NewLine  /// <typeparam name="TResult">The type of the task result.</typeparam> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="task">The task to monitor for cancellation.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="action">The action to take when the task is cancelled, in the context of the UI thread.</param> Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The continuation created to handle cancellation. This is normally ignored.</returns> Di2015NewLine  public Task RegisterCancelledHandler<TResult>(Task<TResult> task, Action action)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return task.ContinueWith(_ => action(), CancellationToken.None, TaskContinuationOptions.OnlyOnCanceled, this.Scheduler);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3258779Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ProcessStartInfo si = new ProcessStartInfo();Di2015NewLine            si.FileName = "handle.exe";     //name of the handle program from sysinternalsDi2015NewLine                                            //assumes that its in the exe directory or in your path Di2015NewLine                                            //environment variableDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //the following three lines are required to be able to read the output (StandardOutput)Di2015NewLine            //and hide the exe window.Di2015NewLine            si.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine            si.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;Di2015NewLine            si.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            si.Arguments = "test.xlsx";     //this is the file you're trying to access that is lockedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //these 4 lines create a process object, start it, then read the output to Di2015NewLine            //a new string variable "s"Di2015NewLine            Process p = new Process();Di2015NewLine            p.StartInfo = si;Di2015NewLine            p.Start();Di2015NewLine            string s = p.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //this will use regular expressions to search the output for process nameDi2015NewLine            //and print it out to the console windowDi2015NewLine            string regex = @"^\\w*\\.EXE";Di2015NewLine            MatchCollection matches = Regex.Matches(s, regex, RegexOptions.Multiline);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var match in matches)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(match);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //this will use regex to search the output for the process id (pid)Di2015NewLine            //and print it to the console window.Di2015NewLine            regex = @"pid: (?<pid>[0-9]*)";Di2015NewLine            matches = Regex.Matches(s, regex, RegexOptions.Multiline);Di2015NewLine            foreach (var obj in matches)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Match match = (Match)obj;   //i have to cast to a Match objectDi2015NewLine                                            //to be able to get the named group outDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(match.Groups["pid"].Value.ToString());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3259715Di2015UniqueSeparator    //Most of this code was from David Hayden's blog:Di2015NewLine    // http://www.davidhayden.com/blog/dave/archive/2006/05/26/2973.aspxDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string connectionString = @"Provider=Microsoft.Jet.OLEDB.4.0;Data Source=C:\\Temp\\TestSO1.xls;Extended Properties=""Excel 8.0;HDR=NO;""";Di2015NewLine        DbProviderFactory factory =Di2015NewLine          DbProviderFactories.GetFactory("System.Data.OleDb");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (DbConnection connection = factory.CreateConnection())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            connection.ConnectionString = connectionString;Di2015NewLine            using (DbCommand command = connection.CreateCommand())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                connection.Open();  //open the connectionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //use the '$' notation after the sheet name to indicate that this isDi2015NewLine                // an existing sheet and not to actually create it.  This basically definesDi2015NewLine                // the metadata for the insert statements that will follow.Di2015NewLine                // If the '$' notation is removed, then a new sheet is created named 'Sheet1'.Di2015NewLine                command.CommandText = "CREATE TABLE [Sheet1$] (F1 number, F2 char(255), F3 char(128))";Di2015NewLine                command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //now we insert the values into the existing sheet...no new sheet is added.Di2015NewLine                command.CommandText = "INSERT INTO [Sheet1$] (F1, F2, F3) VALUES(4,\\"Tampa\\",\\"Florida\\")";Di2015NewLine                command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //insert another row into the sheet...Di2015NewLine                command.CommandText = "INSERT INTO [Sheet1$] (F1, F2, F3) VALUES(5,\\"Pittsburgh\\",\\"Pennsylvania\\")";Di2015NewLine                command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3260159Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TSource> DistinctBy<TSource, TKey>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.DistinctBy(keySelector, null);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<TSource> DistinctBy<TSource, TKey>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector, IEqualityComparer<TKey> keyComparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("source");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (keySelector == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("keySelector");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return source.DistinctByIterator(keySelector, keyComparer);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<TSource> DistinctByIterator<TSource, TKey>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector, IEqualityComparer<TKey> keyComparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var keys = new HashSet<TKey>(keyComparer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (TSource item in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (keys.Add(keySelector(item)))Di2015NewLine            yield return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3260412Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic EventHandler MakeWeakHandler(Action action, Action<EventHandler> remove)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var reference = new WeakReference(action.Target);Di2015NewLine    var method = action.Method;Di2015NewLine    EventHandler handler = null;Di2015NewLine    handler = delegate(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var target = reference.Target;Di2015NewLine        if (target != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            method.Invoke(target, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            remove(handler);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine    return handler;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3261006Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Tuple<int, int> CoordinatesOf<T>(this T[,] matrix, T value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int w = matrix.GetLength(0); // widthDi2015NewLine    int h = matrix.GetLength(1); // heightDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < w; ++x)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < h; ++y)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (matrix[x, y].Equals(value))Di2015NewLine                return Tuple.Create(x, y);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Tuple.Create(-1, -1);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3261309Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerator<T>
3261309Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<T>
3261309Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface ITwoWayEnumerator<T> : IEnumerator<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool MovePrevious();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TwoWayEnumerator<T> : ITwoWayEnumerator<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private IEnumerator<T> _enumerator;Di2015NewLine    private List<T> _buffer;Di2015NewLine    private int _index;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TwoWayEnumerator(IEnumerator<T> enumerator)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (enumerator == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("enumerator");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _enumerator = enumerator;Di2015NewLine        _buffer = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine        _index = -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool MovePrevious()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_index <= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        --_index;Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool MoveNext()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_index < _buffer.Count - 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ++_index;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _buffer.Add(_enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine            ++_index;Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return false;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T CurrentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_index < 0 || _index >= _buffer.Count)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _buffer[_index];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Reset()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _enumerator.Reset();Di2015NewLine        _buffer.Clear();Di2015NewLine        _index = -1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _enumerator.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    object System.Collections.IEnumerator.CurrentDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return Current; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3261309Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TwoWayEnumeratorHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static ITwoWayEnumerator<T> GetTwoWayEnumerator<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullExceptions("source");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new TwoWayEnumerator<T>(source.GetEnumerator());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3261485Di2015UniqueSeparatorFlagsHelper
3261485Di2015UniqueSeparator// The casts to object in the below code are an unfortunate necessity due toDi2015NewLine// C#'s restriction against a where T : Enum constraint. (There are ways aroundDi2015NewLine// this, but they're outside the scope of this simple illustration.)Di2015NewLinepublic static class FlagsHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsSet<T>(T flags, T flag) where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int flagsValue = (int)(object)flags;Di2015NewLine        int flagValue = (int)(object)flag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return (flagsValue & flagValue) != 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Set<T>(ref T flags, T flag) where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int flagsValue = (int)(object)flags;Di2015NewLine        int flagValue = (int)(object)flag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        flags = (T)(object)(flagsValue | flagValue);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Unset<T>(ref T flags, T flag) where T : structDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int flagsValue = (int)(object)flags;Di2015NewLine        int flagValue = (int)(object)flag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        flags = (T)(object)(flagsValue & (~flagValue));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3261485Di2015UniqueSeparatorNames names = Names.Susan | Names.Bob;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool susanIsIncluded = FlagsHelper.IsSet(names, Names.Susan);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinebool karenIsIncluded = FlagsHelper.IsSet(names, Names.Karen);Di2015NewLine

3262547Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ElemInitializer(int ElType, out Element E1)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    E1 = new Element();Di2015NewLine    Type typeofElement = typeof(Element);Di2015NewLine    Type[] assemblyTypes = Assembly.GetAssembly(T1).GetTypes();Di2015NewLine    foreach (Type elementType in assemblyTypes )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (elementType.IsSubclassOf(typeofElement))Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        FieldInfo field = elementType.GetField("ElemType");Di2015NewLine        int elementId = (int)field.GetValue(elementType);Di2015NewLine        if (elementId == ElType)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           E1 = (Element)Activator.CreateInstance(elementType);Di2015NewLine           return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3262883Di2015UniqueSeparatorXDocument doc = XDocument.Parse(@"<Properties>Di2015NewLine                <Property name='ID'>10000</Property>Di2015NewLine                <Property name='Name'>Di2015NewLine                    <SubProperty name='FirstName'>Foo</SubProperty>Di2015NewLine                    <SubProperty name='LastName'>Bar</SubProperty>Di2015NewLine                </Property>Di2015NewLine            </Properties>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineXElement items = new XElement("Items", Di2015NewLine                               from property in doc.Descendants("Property")Di2015NewLine                               select new XElement((string)property.Attribute("name"),Di2015NewLine                                                    // If there are no child elements (SubPropety)Di2015NewLine                                                    // get the property valueDi2015NewLine                                                    property.HasElements ? null : (string)property,Di2015NewLine                                                    // Another way for checking if there are any child elementsDi2015NewLine                                                    // You could also use property.HasElements like the previous statementDi2015NewLine                                                    property.Elements("SubProperty").Any() ?Di2015NewLine                                                    from subproperty in property.Elements("SubProperty")Di2015NewLine                                                    select new XElement((string)subproperty.Attribute("name"),Di2015NewLine                                                                        (string)subproperty) : null)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                          );Di2015NewLine

3263093Di2015UniqueSeparator// gets out a numerical value for each coordinate to make it easier to compareDi2015NewLineprivate long GetIndexForCoord(string coord)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Regex m_regex = new Regex("\\\\d\\\\d:\\\\d\\\\d:\\\\d\\\\d:\\\\d\\\\d");Di2015NewLine    string cleaned = m_regex.Match(coord).Value;Di2015NewLine    cleaned = cleaned.Replace(':', '0');Di2015NewLine    return Convert.ToInt64(cleaned);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// gets out the 5 closest coordinatesDi2015NewLineprivate List<string> GetResults(string coord)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    long index = GetIndexForCoord(coord);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // First find the 5 closest indexes to the one we're looking forDi2015NewLine    List<long> found = new List<long>();Di2015NewLine    while (found.Count < 5)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            long closest = long.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine            long closestAbs = long.MaxValue;Di2015NewLine            foreach (long i in m_indexes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!found.Contains(i))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    long absIndex = Math.Abs(index - i);Di2015NewLine                    if (absIndex < closestAbs)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        closest = i;Di2015NewLine                        closestAbs = absIndex;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            if (closest != long.MaxValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                found.Add(closest);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Then use those indexes to get the coordinates from the dictionaryDi2015NewLine    List<string> s = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (long i in found)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s.Add(m_dic[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return s;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3268024Di2015UniqueSeparator[SecurityPermissionAttribute(SecurityAction.Demand, Unrestricted = true)]Di2015NewLineinternal static void LoadWebService(string webServiceAsmxUrl)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ParseUrl(webServiceAsmxUrl);Di2015NewLine    System.Net.WebClient client = new System.Net.WebClient();Di2015NewLine    // Connect To the web serviceDi2015NewLine    System.IO.Stream stream = client.OpenRead(webServiceAsmxUrl + "?wsdl");Di2015NewLine    // Now read the WSDL file describing a service.Di2015NewLine    ServiceDescription description = ServiceDescription.Read(stream);Di2015NewLine    ///// LOAD THE DOM /////////Di2015NewLine    // Initialize a service description importer.Di2015NewLine    ServiceDescriptionImporter importer = new ServiceDescriptionImporter();Di2015NewLine    importer.ProtocolName = "Soap12"; // Use SOAP 1.2.Di2015NewLine    importer.AddServiceDescription(description, null, null);Di2015NewLine    // Generate a proxy client.Di2015NewLine    importer.Style = ServiceDescriptionImportStyle.Client;Di2015NewLine    // Generate properties to represent primitive values.Di2015NewLine    importer.CodeGenerationOptions = System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions.GenerateProperties;Di2015NewLine    // Initialize a Code-DOM tree into which we will import the service.Di2015NewLine    CodeNamespace nmspace = new CodeNamespace();Di2015NewLine    CodeCompileUnit unit1 = new CodeCompileUnit();Di2015NewLine    unit1.Namespaces.Add(nmspace);Di2015NewLine    // Import the service into the Code-DOM tree. This creates proxy code that uses the service.Di2015NewLine    ServiceDescriptionImportWarnings warning = importer.Import(nmspace, unit1);Di2015NewLine    if (warning == 0) // If zero then we are good to goDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Generate the proxy codeDi2015NewLine        CodeDomProvider provider1 = CodeDomProvider.CreateProvider("CSharp");Di2015NewLine        // Compile the assembly proxy with the appropriate referencesDi2015NewLine        string[] assemblyReferences = new string[5] { "System.dll", "System.Web.Services.dll", "System.Web.dll", "System.Xml.dll", "System.Data.dll" };Di2015NewLine        CompilerParameters parms = new CompilerParameters(assemblyReferences);Di2015NewLine        CompilerResults results = provider1.CompileAssemblyFromDom(parms, unit1);Di2015NewLine        // Check For ErrorsDi2015NewLine        if (results.Errors.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (CompilerError oops in results.Errors)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine("========Compiler error============");Di2015NewLine                System.Diagnostics.Debug.WriteLine(oops.ErrorText);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Compile Error Occured calling webservice. Check Debug ouput window.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Finally, add the web service method to our list of methods to testDi2015NewLine        //--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine        object service = results.CompiledAssembly.CreateInstance(serviceName);Di2015NewLine        Type types = service.GetType();Di2015NewLine        List<MethodInfo> listMethods = types.GetMethods().ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3270479Di2015UniqueSeparator/* 0 */Di2015NewLineunsigned char token;Di2015NewLineunsigned char data[];Di2015NewLineFILE *file;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* 1 */Di2015NewLineif(!fwrite(&token, 1, 1, file))Di2015NewLine    return total;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* 2 */Di2015NewLineif(!fwrite(data, 1, 1, file))Di2015NewLine    return total;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* 3 */Di2015NewLineif(fwrite(data, 1, i, file) != i)Di2015NewLine    return total;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* 4 */Di2015NewLineif(!fread(&token, 1, 1, file))Di2015NewLine    return total;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* 5 */Di2015NewLineif(fread(data, 1, length, file) != length)Di2015NewLine    return total;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* 6 */Di2015NewLinewhile(size && fread(&token, 1, 1, file))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/* 7 */Di2015NewLinedata += i;Di2015NewLinedata[i];
3270479Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLine/* 0 */Di2015NewLineint token; // I'm using 'int' here to easier read single byte from Stream object, in your C code 'token' variable does not overflow so there will be no problem with that is has other type then 'byte'Di2015NewLinebyte[] data;Di2015NewLineint data_pos = 0; // instead of moving 'data' pointer use additional index variableDi2015NewLineStream file; // some stream to read/write bytesDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetry {Di2015NewLine    /* 1 */Di2015NewLine    file.WriteByte((byte)token);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* 2 */Di2015NewLine    file.Write(data, data_pos, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* 3 */Di2015NewLine    file.Write(data, data_pos, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* 4 */Di2015NewLine    if ((token = file.ReadByte()) < 0)Di2015NewLine        return total;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* 5 */Di2015NewLine    if (file.Read(data, data_pos, length) < length)Di2015NewLine        return total;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* 6 */Di2015NewLine    while((size != 0) && ((token = file.ReadByte()) >= 0))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* 7 */Di2015NewLine    data_pos += i;Di2015NewLine    data[data_pos + i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine} catch (IOException e) {Di2015NewLine    return total;Di2015NewLine}

3271422Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Bitmap CropBitmap(Bitmap original)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // determine new leftDi2015NewLine    int newLeft = -1;Di2015NewLine    for (int x = 0; x < original.Width; x++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int y = 0; y < original.Height; y++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Color color = original.GetPixel(x, y);Di2015NewLine            if ((color.R != 255) || (color.G != 255) || (color.B != 255) || Di2015NewLine                (color.A != 0))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // this pixel is either not white or not fully transparentDi2015NewLine                newLeft = x;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (newLeft != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // repeat logic for new right, top and bottomDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Bitmap ret = new Bitmap(newRight - newLeft, newTop - newBottom);Di2015NewLine    using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(ret)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // copy from the original onto the new, using the new coordinates asDi2015NewLine        // source coordinates for the originalDi2015NewLine        g.DrawImage(...);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return retDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3275773Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void calculate_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    double carhours = 3.0;Di2015NewLine    double truckhours = 3.5;Di2015NewLine    double carFirsthour = 5.0;Di2015NewLine    double truckFirsthour = 6.0;Di2015NewLine    double maxCarFee = 38.0;Di2015NewLine    double maxTruckFee = 44.5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int hrs = (int)numericUpDown.Value;Di2015NewLine    double result;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hrs < 1) {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("NO WAY");Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (carButton.Checked) {Di2015NewLine        result = (hrs-1) * carhours + carFirsthour;Di2015NewLine        if (result > maxCarFee) {Di2015NewLine            result = maxCarFee;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine        result = (hrs-1) * truckhours + truckFirsthour;Di2015NewLine        if (result > maxTruckFee) {Di2015NewLine            result = maxTruckFee;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fee.Text = "$" +  result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3275773Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void calculate_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) {Di2015NewLine    double hourlyFee = 3.0;Di2015NewLine    double firstHourFee = 5.0;Di2015NewLine    double max24hrFee = 38.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (!carButton.Checked) {Di2015NewLine       hourlyFee = 3.5;Di2015NewLine       firstHourFee = 6.0;Di2015NewLine       max24hrFee = 44.5;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int hrs = (int)numericUpDown.Value;Di2015NewLine    if (hrs < 1) {Di2015NewLine        MessageBox.Show("NO WAY");Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double result = 0.0;Di2015NewLine    if (hrs >= 24) {Di2015NewLine       result = (hrs / 24) * max24hrFee;Di2015NewLine       hrs = hrs % 24;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (hrs > 0) {Di2015NewLine       result = result + firstHourFee + ((hrs-1) * hourlyFee);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    fee.Text = "$" +  result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3280173Di2015UniqueSeparator</p>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<pre><code>public static class ArrayExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Point RoundIndexToPoint(int index, int radius)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (radius == 0)Di2015NewLine            return new Point(0, 0);Di2015NewLine        Point result = new Point(-radius, -radius);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while (index < 0) index += radius * 8;Di2015NewLine        index = index % (radius * 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int edgeLen = radius * 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (index < edgeLen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.X += index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((index -= edgeLen) < edgeLen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.X = radius;Di2015NewLine            result.Y += index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((index -= edgeLen) < edgeLen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.X = radius - index;Di2015NewLine            result.Y = radius;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((index -= edgeLen) < edgeLen)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Y = radius - index;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T[,] Rotate45<T>(this T[,] array)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int dim = Math.Max(array.GetLength(0), array.GetLength(0));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        T[,] result = new T[dim, dim];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Point center = new Point((result.GetLength(0) - 1) / 2, (result.GetLength(1) - 1) / 2);Di2015NewLine        Point center2 = new Point((array.GetLength(0) - 1) / 2, (array.GetLength(1) - 1) / 2);Di2015NewLine        for (int r = 0; r <= (dim - 1) / 2; r++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i <= r * 8; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Point source = RoundIndexToPoint(i, r);Di2015NewLine                Point target = RoundIndexToPoint(i + r, r);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!(center2.X + source.X < 0 || center2.Y + source.Y < 0 || center2.X + source.X >= array.GetLength(0) || center2.Y + source.Y >= array.GetLength(1)))Di2015NewLine                    result[center.X + target.X, center.Y + target.Y] = array[center2.X + source.X, center2.Y + source.Y];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }     Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3280922Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void OutputStructureToFile(string outputFileName, string folder, string searchPattern)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var file = new StreamWriter(outputFileName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        file.Write(GetStructure(new DirectoryInfo(folder), searchPattern));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string GetStructure(DirectoryInfo directoryInfo, string searchPattern)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return GetStructureRecursive(directoryInfo, searchPattern, 0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string GetStructureRecursive(DirectoryInfo directoryInfo, string searchPattern, int level)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var indentation = level * 5;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(new String(' ', indentation));Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(directoryInfo.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var directory in directoryInfo.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(GetStructureRecursive(directory, searchPattern, level+1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var groupedByExtension = directoryInfo.GetFiles(searchPattern)Di2015NewLine                                          .GroupBy(file => file.Extension)Di2015NewLine                                          .Select(group => new { Group = group.Key, Count = group.Count() });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var entry in groupedByExtension)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(new String(' ', indentation));Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine(String.Format("   {0,10} {1,3}", entry.Group, entry.Count));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3280922Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string GetStructureRecursiveForCsv(DirectoryInfo directoryInfo, string searchPattern, int level)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var indentation = level;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(new String(';', indentation));Di2015NewLine    sb.AppendLine(directoryInfo.Name);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var directory in directoryInfo.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(GetStructureRecursiveForCsv(directory, searchPattern, level+1));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var groupedByExtension = directoryInfo.GetFiles(searchPattern)Di2015NewLine                                          .GroupBy(file => file.Extension)Di2015NewLine                                          .Select(group => new { Group = group.Key, Count = group.Count() });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var entry in groupedByExtension)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(new String(';', indentation));Di2015NewLine        sb.AppendLine(String.Format(";{0};{1}", entry.Group, entry.Count));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

/// </summary>Di2015NewLine            FO_COPY = 0x0002,Di2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Delete (or recycle) the objectsDi2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            FO_DELETE = 0x0003,Di2015NewLine            /// <summary>Di2015NewLine            /// Rename the object(s)Di2015NewLine            /// </summary>Di2015NewLine            FO_RENAME = 0x0004,Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// SHFILEOPSTRUCT for SHFileOperation from COMDi2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        [StructLayout(LayoutKind.Sequential, CharSet = CharSet.Auto, Pack = 1)]Di2015NewLine        private struct SHFILEOPSTRUCTDi2015NewLine 3282601Di2015UniqueSeparatorSELECT  MIN(Products.pName) AS pName,Di2015NewLine        Products.pCode AS ProductCode,Di2015NewLine        MIN(Products.pGroup) AS GroupName, Di2015NewLine        Sales_Trans.Price,Di2015NewLine        SUM(Sales_Trans.Sales_Qty) AS SalesQty, Di2015NewLine        SUM(Sales_Trans.Sales_Value) AS SalesValue, Di2015NewLine        SUM(Sales_Trans.Break_Qty) AS BreakQty, Di2015NewLine        SUM(Sales_Trans.Break_Value) AS BreakValue, Di2015NewLine        SUM(Sales_Trans.Return_Qty) AS ReturnQty, Di2015NewLine        SUM(Sales_Trans.Return_Value) AS ReturnValue, Di2015NewLineFROM ProductsDi2015NewLineJOIN        Di2015NewLine(SELECT ProductCode, Price, Quantity Sales_Qty, Price * Quantity Sales_Value, 0 Break_Qty, 0 Break_Value, 0 Return_Qty, 0 Return_Value FROM SalesLogDi2015NewLine WHERE  (BillDate = '07/01/2010') AND (pGroup <> 15) AND (pGroup <> 16)Di2015NewLine UNION ALLDi2015NewLine SELECT ProductCode, Price, 0 Sales_Qty, 0 Sales_Value, 0 Break_Qty, 0 Break_Value, Quantity Return_Qty, Price * Quantity Return_Value FROM SalesReturnDi2015NewLine WHERE  (BillDate = '07/01/2010') AND (pGroup <> 15) AND (pGroup <> 16)Di2015NewLine UNION ALLDi2015NewLine SELECT ProductCode, Price, 0 Sales_Qty, 0 Sales_Value, Quantity Break_Qty, Price * Quantity Break_Value, 0 Return_Qty, 0 Return_Value FROM BreakagesDi2015NewLine WHERE  (BillDate = '07/01/2010') AND (pGroup <> 15) AND (pGroup <> 16)Di2015NewLine) Sales_TransDi2015NewLineON (Products.pCode = Sales_Trans.ProductCode) and (Products.pPrice = Sales_Trans.Price)Di2015NewLineGROUP BY Products.pCode, Sales_Trans.PriceDi2015NewLineORDER BY 2,1Di2015NewLine

3282648Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NotifyingBlockingCollection<T> : BlockingCollection<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Thread m_Notifier;Di2015NewLine    private BlockingCollection<Action<T>> m_Callbacks = new BlockingCollection<Action<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NotifyingBlockingCollection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_Notifier = new Thread(Notify);Di2015NewLine        m_Notifier.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine        m_Notifier.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Notify()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Action<T> callback = m_Callbacks.Take();Di2015NewLine            T item = Take();Di2015NewLine            callback.BeginInvoke(item, null, null); // Transfer to the thread pool.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RegisterForTake(Action<T> callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_Callbacks.Add(callback);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3282648Di2015UniqueSeparatorAdd
3282648Di2015UniqueSeparatorRegisterForTake
3282648Di2015UniqueSeparatorTake
3282648Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NotifyingBlockingCollection<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private BlockingCollection<T> m_Items = new BlockingCollection<T>();Di2015NewLine    private Queue<Action<T>> m_Callbacks = new Queue<Action<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NotifyingBlockingCollection()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Add(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_Callbacks)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (m_Callbacks.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Action<T> callback = m_Callbacks.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine                callback.BeginInvoke(item, null, null); // Transfer to the thread pool.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_Items.Add(item);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Take()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return m_Items.Take();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void RegisterForTake(Action<T> callback)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (m_Callbacks)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T item;Di2015NewLine            if (m_Items.TryTake(out item))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                callback.BeginInvoke(item, null, null); // Transfer to the thread pool.Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                m_Callbacks.Enqueue(callback);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3282806Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ABCDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public int a,b;Di2015NewLine  public ABC(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    a = x;Di2015NewLine    b = y;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static ABC operator ++(ABC x)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    x.a++;Di2015NewLine    x.b++;Di2015NewLine    return x;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var a = new ABC(5, 6);Di2015NewLine        if ((a.a != 5) || (a.b != 6)) Console.WriteLine(".ctor failed");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var post = a++;Di2015NewLine        if ((a.a != 6) || (a.b != 7)) Console.WriteLine("post incrementation failed");Di2015NewLine        if ((post.a != 5) || (post.b != 6)) Console.WriteLine("post incrementation result failed");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var pre = ++a;Di2015NewLine        if ((a.a != 7) || (a.b != 8)) Console.WriteLine("pre incrementation failed");Di2015NewLine        if ((pre.a != 7) || (pre.b != 8)) Console.WriteLine("pre incrementation result failed");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Read();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

printerUncName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var printerInfo2 = new PrinterInfo2();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var pHandle = new IntPtr();Di2015NewLine            var defaults = new PrinterDefaults();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Open a handle to the printerDi2015NewLine                bool ok = OpenPrinter(printerUncName, out pHandle, defaults);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!ok)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //OpenPrinter failed, get the last known error and thrown itDi2015NewLine                    throw new Win32Exception(Marshal.GetLastWin32Error());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Here we determine the size of the data we to be returnedDi2015NewLine                //Passing in 0 for the size will force the function to return the size of the data requestedDi2015NewLine                int actualDataSize = 0;Di2015NewLine                GetPrinter(pHandle, 2, IntPtr.Zero, 0, ref actualDataSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                int err = Marshal.GetLastWin32Error();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (err == 122)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (actualDataSize > 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //Allocate memory to the size of the data requestedDi2015NewLine                        IntPtr printerData = Marshal.AllocHGlobal(actualDataSize);Di2015NewLine                        //Retrieve the actual information this timeDi2015NewLine                        GetPrinter(pHandle, 2, printerData, actualDataSize, ref actualDataSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //Marshal to our structureDi2015NewLine                        printerInfo2 = (PrinterInfo2)Marshal.PtrToStructure(printerData, typeof(PrinterInfo2));Di2015NewLine                        //We've made the conversion, now free up that memoryDi2015NewLine                        Marshal.FreeHGlobal(printerData);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    throw new Win32Exception(err);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return printerInfo2;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Always close the handle to the printerDi2015NewLine                ClosePrinter(pHandle);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3286050Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CoinageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public long Copper { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            long change = Copper;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var denominations = new[] {"Gold", "Silver"};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            int numberOfDenominations = denominations.Count();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var denomination in denominations)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int coppersToCurrentDenomination = ((int) Math.Pow(100, numberOfDenominations));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                long currentAmount = change / coppersToCurrentDenomination;Di2015NewLine                result.AppendFormat("{0}:{1}", denomination, currentAmount);Di2015NewLine                change -= (currentAmount * coppersToCurrentDenomination);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                numberOfDenominations--;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            result.AppendFormat("Copper:{0}", change);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3286646Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    decimal diff;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    diff = monthDifference(new DateTime(2001, 1, 1), new DateTime(2002, 3, 15));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(diff.ToString("n2")); //14.45Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    diff = monthDifference(new DateTime(2001, 1, 1), new DateTime(2001, 4, 16));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(diff.ToString("n2")); //3.50Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    diff = monthDifference(new DateTime(2001, 7, 5), new DateTime(2002, 7, 10));Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(diff.ToString("n2")); //12.16Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.Read();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic decimal monthDifference(DateTime d1, DateTime d2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (d1 > d2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DateTime hold = d1;Di2015NewLine        d1 = d2;Di2015NewLine        d2 = hold;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int monthsApart = Math.Abs(12 * (d1.Year-d2.Year) + d1.Month - d2.Month) - 1;Di2015NewLine    decimal daysInMonth1 = DateTime.DaysInMonth(d1.Year, d1.Month);Di2015NewLine    decimal daysInMonth2 = DateTime.DaysInMonth(d2.Year, d2.Month);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    decimal dayPercentage = ((daysInMonth1 - d1.Day) / daysInMonth1)Di2015NewLine                          + (d2.Day / daysInMonth2);Di2015NewLine    return monthsApart + dayPercentage;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3287118Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic const int FYBeginMonth = 7, FYBeginDay = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int FiscalYearFromDate(DateTime date)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return date.Month > FYBeginMonth ||Di2015NewLine           date.Month == FYBeginMonth && date.Day >= FYBeginDay ?Di2015NewLine        date.Year : date.Year - 1;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<DateRangeWithPeriods>Di2015NewLine              FiscalYears(IEnumerable<DateRange> continuousDates)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int startYear = FiscalYearFromDate(continuousDates.First().Begin),Di2015NewLine        endYear = FiscalYearFromDate(continuousDates.Last().End);Di2015NewLine    return from year in Enumerable.Range(startYear, endYear - startYear + 1)Di2015NewLine           select new DateRangeWithPeriods {Di2015NewLine               Range = new DateRange { Begin = FiscalYearBegin(year),Di2015NewLine                                       End = FiscalYearEnd(year) },Di2015NewLine      // start with the periods that began the previous FY and end in this FYDi2015NewLine               Periods = (from range in continuousDatesDi2015NewLine                          where FiscalYearFromDate(range.Begin) < yearDi2015NewLine                             && FiscalYearFromDate(range.End) == yearDi2015NewLine                          select new DateRange { Begin = FiscalYearBegin(year),Di2015NewLine                                                 End = range.End })Di2015NewLine                          // add the periods that begin this FYDi2015NewLine                  .Concat(from range in continuousDatesDi2015NewLine                          where FiscalYearFromDate(range.Begin) == yearDi2015NewLine                          select new DateRange { Begin = range.Begin,Di2015NewLine                                 End = Min(range.End, FiscalYearEnd(year)) })Di2015NewLine                          // add the periods that completely span this FYDi2015NewLine                  .Concat(from range in continuousDatesDi2015NewLine                          where FiscalYearFromDate(range.Begin) < yearDi2015NewLine                             && FiscalYearFromDate(range.End) > yearDi2015NewLine                          select new DateRange { Begin = FiscalYearBegin(year),Di2015NewLine                                                 End = FiscalYearEnd(year) })Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine           };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3292046Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void EquivalentSplit(string path, out string head, out string tail)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the directory separation character (i.e. '\\').Di2015NewLine    string separator = System.IO.Path.DirectorySeparatorChar.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Trim any separators at the end of the pathDi2015NewLine    string lastCharacter = path.Substring(path.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine    if (separator == lastCharacter)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        path = path.Substring(0, path.Length - 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int lastSeparatorIndex = path.LastIndexOf(separator);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    head = path.Substring(0, lastSeparatorIndex);Di2015NewLine    tail = path.Substring(lastSeparatorIndex + separator.Length,Di2015NewLine        path.Length - lastSeparatorIndex - separator.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3292767Di2015UniqueSeparatorIFactory<T>
3292767Di2015UniqueSeparator[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class CommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public abstract void Execute();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class FactoryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Dictionary<Type, Func<object[], object>> _DelegateCache = new Dictionary<Type, Func<object[], object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Register<T>(Func<object[], object> @delegate)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _DelegateCache[typeof(T)] = @delegate;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T CreateMyType<T>(params object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)_DelegateCache[typeof(T)](args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IFactory<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    T Create();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class CreateCommand<T> : CommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Item { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLine    protected IFactory<T> _ItemFactory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CreateCommand(IFactory<T> itemFactory)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this._ItemFactory = itemFactory;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Execute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Item = this._ItemFactory.Create();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This class is a base class that represents a factory capable of creating an instance using a dynamic set of arguments.Di2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class DynamicFactory<T> : IFactory<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public object[] Args { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicFactory(params object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Args = args;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicFactory(int numberOfArgs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (numberOfArgs < 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("numberOfArgs", "The numberOfArgs parameter must be greater than or equal to zero.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.Args = new object[numberOfArgs];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IFactory<T> MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract T Create();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This implementation uses the Activator.CreateInstance function to create an instanceDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class DynamicConstructorFactory<T> : DynamicFactory<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DynamicConstructorFactory(params object[] args) : base(args) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DynamicConstructorFactory(int numberOfArgs) : base(numberOfArgs) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override T Create()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)Activator.CreateInstance(typeof(T), this.Args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This implementation uses the Factory.CreateMyType function to create an instanceDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class MyTypeFactory<T> : DynamicFactory<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MyTypeFactory(params object[] args) : base(args) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyTypeFactory(int numberOfArgs) : base(numberOfArgs) { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override T Create()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Factory.CreateMyType<T>(this.Args);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLineclass DefaultConstructorExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DefaultConstructorExample()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLineclass NoDefaultConstructorExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public NoDefaultConstructorExample(int a, string b, float c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLineclass PrivateConstructorExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private int _A;Di2015NewLine    private string _B;Di2015NewLine    private float _C;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private PrivateConstructorExample()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Register()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // register a delegate with the Factory class that will construct an instance of this class using an array of argumentsDi2015NewLine        Factory.Register<PrivateConstructorExample>((args) =>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (args == null || args.Length != 3)Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException("Expected 3 arguments.", "args");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!(args[0] is int))Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException("First argument must be of type System.Int32.", "args[0]");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!(args[1] is string))Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException("Second argument must be of type System.String.", "args[1]");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (!(args[2] is float))Di2015NewLine                    throw new ArgumentException("Third argument must be of type System.Single.", "args[2]");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                var instance = new PrivateConstructorExample();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                instance._A = (int)args[0];Di2015NewLine                instance._B = (string)args[1];Di2015NewLine                instance._C = (float)args[2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return instance;Di2015NewLine            });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var factory1 = new DynamicConstructorFactory<DefaultConstructorExample>(null);Di2015NewLine        var command1 = new CreateCommand<DefaultConstructorExample>(factory1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var factory2 = new DynamicConstructorFactory<NoDefaultConstructorExample>(3);Di2015NewLine        factory2.Args[0] = 5;Di2015NewLine        factory2.Args[1] = "ABC";Di2015NewLine        factory2.Args[2] = 7.1f;Di2015NewLine        var command2 = new CreateCommand<NoDefaultConstructorExample>(factory2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        PrivateConstructorExample.Register(); // register this class so that it can be created by the Factory.CreateMyType functionDi2015NewLine        var factory3 = new MyTypeFactory<PrivateConstructorExample>(3);Di2015NewLine        factory3.Args[0] = 5;Di2015NewLine        factory3.Args[1] = "ABC";Di2015NewLine        factory3.Args[2] = 7.1f;Di2015NewLine        var command3 = new CreateCommand<PrivateConstructorExample>(factory3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<DefaultConstructorExample>(command1);Di2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<NoDefaultConstructorExample>(command2);Di2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<PrivateConstructorExample>(command3);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void VerifySerializability<T>(CreateCommand<T> originalCommand)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var serializer = new System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine        using (var stream = new System.IO.MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(originalCommand.Item == null); // assert that originalCommand does not yet have a value for ItemDi2015NewLine            serializer.Serialize(stream, originalCommand); // serialize the originalCommand objectDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            stream.Seek(0, System.IO.SeekOrigin.Begin); // reset the stream position to the beginning for deserializationDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // deserializeDi2015NewLine            var deserializedCommand = serializer.Deserialize(stream) as CreateCommand<T>;Di2015NewLine            System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(deserializedCommand.Item == null); // assert that deserializedCommand still does not have a value for ItemDi2015NewLine            deserializedCommand.Execute();Di2015NewLine            System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert(deserializedCommand.Item != null); // assert that deserializedCommand now has a value for ItemDi2015NewLine 3292767Di2015UniqueSeparator[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class CommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public abstract void Execute();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic abstract class CreateCommand<T> : CommandDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public T Item { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Factory<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly object _SyncLock = new object();Di2015NewLine    private static Func<T> _CreateFunc;Di2015NewLine    private static Dictionary<string, Func<T>> _CreateFuncDictionary;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Registers a default Create Func delegate for type <typeparamref name="T"/>.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static void Register(Func<T> createFunc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_SyncLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _CreateFunc = createFunc;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T Create()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_SyncLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(_CreateFunc == null)Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("A [{0}] delegate must be registered as the default delegate for type [{1}]..", typeof(Func<T>).FullName, typeof(T).FullName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return _CreateFunc();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Registers a Create Func delegate for type <typeparamref name="T"/> using the given key.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="key"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="createFunc"></param>Di2015NewLine    public static void Register(string key, Func<T> createFunc)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_SyncLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (_CreateFuncDictionary == null)Di2015NewLine                _CreateFuncDictionary = new Dictionary<string, Func<T>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            _CreateFuncDictionary[key] = createFunc;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T Create(string key)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_SyncLock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Func<T> createFunc;Di2015NewLine            if (_CreateFuncDictionary != null && _CreateFuncDictionary.TryGetValue(key, out createFunc))Di2015NewLine                return createFunc();Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("A [{0}] delegate must be registered with the given key \\"{1}\\".", typeof(Func<T>).FullName, key));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class CreateCommandWithDefaultDelegate<T> : CreateCommand<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void Execute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Item = Factory<T>.Create();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLinepublic class CreateCommandWithKeyedDelegate<T> : CreateCommand<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string CreateKey { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CreateCommandWithKeyedDelegate(string createKey)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.CreateKey = createKey;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Execute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Item = Factory<T>.Create(this.CreateKey);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLineclass DefaultConstructorExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public DefaultConstructorExample()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[Serializable]Di2015NewLineclass NoDefaultConstructorExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public PublicPropertiesExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int A { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string B { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public float C { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // register delegates for each typeDi2015NewLine        Factory<DefaultConstructorExample>.Register(() => new DefaultConstructorExample());Di2015NewLine        Factory<NoDefaultConstructorExample>.Register(() => new NoDefaultConstructorExample(5, "ABC", 7.1f));Di2015NewLine        Factory<PublicPropertiesExample>.Register(() => new PublicPropertiesExample() { A = 5, B = "ABC", C = 7.1f });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create commandsDi2015NewLine        var command1 = new CreateCommandWithDefaultDelegate<DefaultConstructorExample>();Di2015NewLine        var command2 = new CreateCommandWithDefaultDelegate<DefaultConstructorExample>();Di2015NewLine        var command3 = new CreateCommandWithDefaultDelegate<DefaultConstructorExample>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // verify that each command can be serialized/deserialized and that the creation logic worksDi2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<DefaultConstructorExample>(command1);Di2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<DefaultConstructorExample>(command2);Di2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<DefaultConstructorExample>(command3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // register additional delegates for each type, distinguished by keyDi2015NewLine        Factory<DefaultConstructorExample>.Register("CreateCommand", () => new DefaultConstructorExample());Di2015NewLine => new PublicPropertiesExample() { A = 5, B = "ABC", C = 7.1f });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create commands, passing in the create key to the constructorDi2015NewLine        var command4 = new CreateCommandWithKeyedDelegate<DefaultConstructorExample>("CreateCommand");Di2015NewLine        var command5 = new CreateCommandWithKeyedDelegate<DefaultConstructorExample>("CreateCommand");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // verify that each command can be serialized/deserialized and that the creation logic worksDi2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<DefaultConstructorExample>(command4);Di2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<DefaultConstructorExample>(command5);Di2015NewLine        VerifySerializability<DefaultConstructorExample>(command6);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void VerifySerializability<T>(CreateCommand<T> originalCommand)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var serializer = new System.Runtime.Serialization.Formatters.Binary.BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine        using (var stream = new System.IO.MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine score : 0, scoreIsSvc ? 0 : score));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (scoreIsSvc)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _records[user].Svc += score;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _records[user].Vss += score;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DataTable ToDataTable()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        DataTable dt = new DataTable();Di2015NewLine        dt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("User"));Di2015NewLine        dt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("Svc"));Di2015NewLine        dt.Columns.Add(new DataColumn("Vss"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach(var key in _records.Keys)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DataRow dr = dt.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            dr["User"] = key;Di2015NewLine            dr["Svc"] = _records[key].Svc;Di2015NewLine            dr["Vss"] = _records[key].Vss;Di2015NewLine            dt.Rows.Add(dr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dt;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class RunDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public void RunApp(DataTable source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Builder b = new Builder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow dr in source.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            b.Add((string) dr["User"], (string) dr["Unit"], (double) dr["Score"]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DataTable dt = b.ToDataTable();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3297159Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic String GetMethodParameterArray()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var output = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        output.AppendLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type t = typeof(API);Di2015NewLine        foreach (var mi in t.GetMethods())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine                var argsLine = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                bool isFirst = true;Di2015NewLine                argsLine.Append("object[] args = {");Di2015NewLine                var args = mi.GetParameters();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (var pi in args)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    if (isFirst)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        isFirst = false;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        argsLine.Append(", ");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    argsLine.AppendFormat("{0}", pi.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                argsLine.AppendLine("};"); //close object[] initialiserDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                output.AppendLine(argsLine.ToString());Di2015NewLine                output.AppendFormat("Log(\\"{0}\\",args);", mi.Name);Di2015NewLine                output.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine                output.AppendLine();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        return output.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

bottomLeft,Di2015NewLine        QuadTree<T> bottomRight)Di2015NewLine        : base(topLeft.Width + topRight.Width, Di2015NewLine            topLeft.Height + bottomLeft.Heigth)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // TODO: Do proper checks.Di2015NewLine        if (this.Width != topLeft.Width + bottomRight.Width)Di2015NewLine            throw Exception();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override T Get(int x, int y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x <= this.topLeft.Width)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (y <=              return this.topLeft.Get(x, y + this.topLeft.Heigth);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (y <= 3303205Di2015UniqueSeparatorT[,] _leaf1 = new T[64,64];Di2015NewLineT[,] _leaf2 = new T[64,64];Di2015NewLineT[,] _leaf3 = new T[64,64];Di2015NewLineT[,] _leaf4 = new T[64,64];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Populate leafsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineQuadTree<T> l1 = new MatrixQuadTree<T>(_leaf1,64,64);Di2015NewLineQuadTree<T> l2 = new MatrixQuadTree<T>(_leaf2,64,64);Di2015NewLineQuadTree<T> l3 = new MatrixQuadTree<T>(_leaf3,64,64);Di2015NewLineQuadTree<T> l4 = new MatrixQuadTree<T>(_leaf4,64,64);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Instead of copying, you can no do this:Di2015NewLineQuadTree<T> c = CompositeQuadTree<T>(l1,l2,l3,l4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// And you can even make composites, of other composites:Di2015NewLineQuadTree<T> c2 = CompositeQuadTree<T>(c,c,c,c);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// And you can read a value as follows:Di2015NewLineT value = c2[30, 50];Di2015NewLine
