3303429Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CredentialsSectionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Username { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Password { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[XmlRoot(Namespace = "", IsNullable = false)]Di2015NewLinepublic class configurationDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks/>Di2015NewLine    public string logging { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <remarks/>Di2015NewLine    [XmlElement("credentials")]Di2015NewLine    public List<CredentialsSection> credentials { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string Serialize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var credentialsSection = new CredentialsSection {Username = "a", Password = "b"};Di2015NewLine        this.credentials = new List<CredentialsSection> {credentialsSection, credentialsSection};Di2015NewLine        this.logging = "log this";Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer s = new XmlSerializer(this.GetType());Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        TextWriter w = new StringWriter(sb);Di2015NewLine        s.Serialize(w, this);Di2015NewLine        w.Flush();Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3303670Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction RunAsUser(CommandLine, WorkDirectory: string; Wait: Boolean): Boolean;Di2015NewLineconstDi2015NewLine  TOKEN_ADJUST_SESSIONID = $0100;Di2015NewLine  dwTokenRights = TOKEN_QUERY or TOKEN_ASSIGN_PRIMARY or TOKEN_DUPLICATE or TOKEN_ADJUST_DEFAULT or TOKEN_ADJUST_SESSIONID;Di2015NewLinevarDi2015NewLine  WExe, WCmdLine, wCurrDir: WideString;Di2015NewLine  hProcessToken, dwLastErr, retLength, hwnd, dwPID, hShellProcess, hShellProcessToken, hPrimaryToken: Cardinal;Di2015NewLine  tkp: TOKEN_PRIVILEGES;Di2015NewLine  PI: TProcessInformation;Di2015NewLine  SI: TStartupInfoW;Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine  Result:= False;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  hShellProcessToken:= 0;Di2015NewLine  hPrimaryToken:= 0;Di2015NewLine  hShellProcess:= 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if WorkDirectory = '' then WorkDirectory:= GetCurrentDir;Di2015NewLine  Wexe:= SeparateText(CommandLine, ' ');Di2015NewLine  WCmdLine:= CommandLine;Di2015NewLine  wCurrDir:= WorkDirectory;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Enable SeIncreaseQuotaPrivilege in this process.  (This won't work if current process is not elevated.)Di2015NewLine    if not OpenProcessToken(GetCurrentProcess(), TOKEN_ADJUST_PRIVILEGES, hProcessToken) then Exit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  tkp.PrivilegeCount:= 1;Di2015NewLine  LookupPrivilegeValueW(nil, SE_INCREASE_QUOTA_NAME, tkp.Privileges[0].Luid);Di2015NewLine  tkp.Privileges[0].Attributes:= SE_PRIVILEGE_ENABLED;Di2015NewLine  AdjustTokenPrivileges(hProcessToken, FALSE, tkp, 0, nil, retLength);Di2015NewLine  dwLastErr:= GetLastError();Di2015NewLine  CloseHandle(hProcessToken);Di2015NewLine  if (dwLastErr <> ERROR_SUCCESS) then Exit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get an HWND representing the desktop shell.Di2015NewLine    // CAVEATS:  This will fail if the shell is not running (crashed or terminated), or the default shell has beenDi2015NewLine    // replaced with a custom shell.  This also won't return what you probably want if Explorer has been terminated andDi2015NewLine    // restarted elevated.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    hwnd:= GetShellWindow();Di2015NewLine  if hwnd = 0 then Exit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Get the PID of the desktop shell process.Di2015NewLine  GetWindowThreadProcessId(hwnd, dwPID);Di2015NewLine  if dwPID = 0 then Exit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // Open the desktop shell process in order to query it (get the token)Di2015NewLine  hShellProcess:= OpenProcess(PROCESS_QUERY_INFORMATION, FALSE, dwPID);Di2015NewLine  if hShellProcess = 0 then Exit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // From this point down, we have handles to close, so make sure to clean up.Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine    // Get the process token of the desktop shell.Di2015NewLine    if not OpenProcessToken(hShellProcess, TOKEN_DUPLICATE, hShellProcessToken) then Exit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Duplicate the shell's process token to get a primary token.Di2015NewLine    // Based on experimentation, this is the minimal set of rights required for CreateProcessWithTokenW (contrary to current documentation).Di2015NewLine    if not DuplicateTokenEx(hShellProcessToken, dwTokenRights, nil, SecurityImpersonation, TokenPrimary, hPrimaryToken) then Exit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    SI.cb:= SizeOf(SI);Di2015NewLine    FillChar(SI, SI.cb, 0);Di2015NewLine    SI.wShowWindow:= SW_SHOWNORMAL;Di2015NewLine    SI.dwFlags:= STARTF_USESHOWWINDOW;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Start the target process with the new token.Di2015NewLine    Result:= CreateProcessWithTokenW(Di2015NewLine      hPrimaryToken,Di2015NewLine      0,Di2015NewLine      PWideChar(WExe),Di2015NewLine      PWideChar(wCmdLine),Di2015NewLine      0,Di2015NewLine      nil,Di2015NewLine      PWideChar(wCurrDir),Di2015NewLine      @si,Di2015NewLine      @pi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if not Result then Exit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if Wait thenDi2015NewLine      while MsgWaitForMultipleObjects(1, PI.hProcess, False, INFINITE, QS_ALLINPUT) <> WAIT_OBJECT_0 doDi2015NewLine        ProcessMessages;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    CloseHandle(PI.hProcess);Di2015NewLine  finallyDi2015NewLine    // Clean up resourcesDi2015NewLine    CloseHandle(hShellProcessToken);Di2015NewLine      CloseHandle(hPrimaryToken);Di2015NewLine    CloseHandle(hShellProcess);Di2015NewLine  end;Di2015NewLineend;Di2015NewLine

3303813Di2015UniqueSeparatorNorthwnd db = new Northwnd("...");Di2015NewLinetryDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // here we attempt to submit changes for the databaseDi2015NewLine    // The ContinueOnConflict specifies that all updates to the Di2015NewLine    // database should be tried, and that concurrency conflictsDi2015NewLine    // should be accumulated and returned at the end of the process.Di2015NewLine    db.SubmitChanges(ConflictMode.ContinueOnConflict);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinecatch (ChangeConflictException e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // we got a change conflict, so we need to process itDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(e.Message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // There may be many change conflicts (if multiple DB tables wereDi2015NewLine    // affected, for example), so we need to loop over eachDi2015NewLine    // conflict and resolve it. Di2015NewLine    foreach (ObjectChangeConflict occ in db.ChangeConflicts)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // To resolve each conflict, we callDi2015NewLine        // ObjectChangeConflict.Resolve, and we pass in OverWriteCurrentValuesDi2015NewLine        // so that the current values will be overwritten with the valuesDi2015NewLine        // from the databaseDi2015NewLine        occ.Resolve(RefreshMode.OverwriteCurrentValues);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3307796Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IList<T[]> GeneratePermutations<T>(T[] objs, long? limit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new List<T[]>();Di2015NewLine        long n = Factorial(objs.Length);Di2015NewLine        n = (!limit.HasValue || limit.Value > n) ? n : (limit.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (long k = 0; k < n; k++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T[] kperm = GenerateKthPermutation<T>(k, objs);Di2015NewLine            result.Add(kperm);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T[] GenerateKthPermutation<T>(long k, T[] objs)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T[] permutedObjs = new T[objs.Length];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < objs.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            permutedObjs[i] = objs[i];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 2; j < objs.Length + 1; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            k = k / (j - 1);                      // integer division cuts off the remainderDi2015NewLine            long i1 = (k % j);Di2015NewLine            long i2 = j - 1;Di2015NewLine            if (i1 != i2)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T tmpObj1 = permutedObjs[i1];Di2015NewLine                T tmpObj2 = permutedObjs[i2];Di2015NewLine                permutedObjs[i1] = tmpObj2;Di2015NewLine                permutedObjs[i2] = tmpObj1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return permutedObjs;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static long Factorial(int n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (n < 0) { throw new Exception("Unaccepted input for factorial"); }    //error result - undefinedDi2015NewLine        if (n > 256) { throw new Exception("Input too big for factorial"); }  //error result - input is too bigDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (n == 0) { return 1; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Calculate the factorial iteratively rather than recursively:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        long tempResult = 1;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tempResult *= i;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return tempResult;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3308773Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TSource> Repeating<TSource, TValue>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, Func<TSource, TValue> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            TValue prev = selector(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            var comparer = EqualityComparer<TValue>.Default;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TValue curr = selector(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (comparer.Equals(prev, curr))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return curr;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                prev = curr;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3312369Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate JSONObject sendJsonRequest(string host, int port,Di2015NewLine       String uri, JSONObject param) Di2015NewLine            throws ClientProtocolException, IOException, JSONExceptionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpClient httpClient = new DefaultHttpClient();Di2015NewLine    HttpHost httpHost = new HttpHost(host, port);   Di2015NewLine    HttpPost httpPost = new HttpPost(uri);Di2015NewLine    httpPost.addHeader("Content-Type", "application/json; charset=utf-8");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<pre><code>if (param != null)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    HttpEntity bodyEntity = new StringEntity(param.toString(), "utf8");Di2015NewLine    httpPost.setEntity(bodyEntity);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineHttpResponse response = httpClient.execute(httpHost, httpPost);Di2015NewLineHttpEntity entity = response.getEntity();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineString result = null;Di2015NewLineif (entity != null) {Di2015NewLine    InputStream instream = entity.getContent();Di2015NewLine    BufferedReader reader = new BufferedReader(Di2015NewLine         new InputStreamReader(instream));Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String line = null;Di2015NewLine    while ((line = reader.readLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        sb.append(line + "\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result = sb.toString();Di2015NewLine    instream.close();           Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinehttpPost.abort();Di2015NewLinereturn result != null ? new JSONObject(result) : null;Di2015NewLine

3312369Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void getUser() {Di2015NewLine    // if you put a json object to the serverDi2015NewLine    // the properties are automagically mapped to the methods' input parametersDi2015NewLine    JSONObject param = new JSONObject();Di2015NewLine    param.put("name", "John Doe");Di2015NewLine    param.put("age", 47);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<pre><code>    JSONObject result = sendJsonRequest("server", 80, Di2015NewLine          "http://server:80/service1.asmx/GetUser", param);Di2015NewLine    if (result != null) {Di2015NewLine        JSONObject user = new JSONObject(result.getString("d"));Di2015NewLine        // .net webservices always return the resultDi2015NewLine        // wrapped in a parameter named "d"Di2015NewLine        system.out.println(user.getString("name"));Di2015NewLine        system.out.println(user.getInt("age").toString());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
3312369Di2015UniqueSeparatorimport org.json.JSONException;Di2015NewLineimport org.json.JSONObject;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class JSONExceptionHelper {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine<pre><code>private static final String KEY_MESSAGE = "Message";Di2015NewLineprivate static final String KEY_EXCEPTIONTYPE = "ExceptionType";Di2015NewLineprivate static final String KEY_STACKTRACE = "StackTrace";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static boolean isException(JSONObject json) {Di2015NewLine    return json == null Di2015NewLine        ? falseDi2015NewLine        : json.has(KEY_MESSAGE) && Di2015NewLine          json.has(KEY_EXCEPTIONTYPE) && Di2015NewLine          json.has(KEY_STACKTRACE);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void ThrowJsonException(JSONObject json) throws JSONException {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    String message = json.getString(KEY_MESSAGE);Di2015NewLine    String exceptiontype = json.getString(KEY_EXCEPTIONTYPE);Di2015NewLine    String stacktrace = json.getString(KEY_STACKTRACE);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    sb.append(exceptiontype);Di2015NewLine    sb.append(": ");Di2015NewLine    sb.append(message);Di2015NewLine    sb.append(System.getProperty("line.separator"));Di2015NewLine    sb.append(stacktrace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    throw new JSONException(sb.toString());Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3312475Di2015UniqueSeparatorDi2015NewLine        static public String EncryptString(String message)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String sRet = "";Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged rj = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rj.Key = Key;Di2015NewLine                rj.IV = IV;Di2015NewLine                MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, rj.CreateEncryptor(Key, IV), CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (StreamWriter sw = new StreamWriter(cs))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sw.Write(message);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                byte[] encoded = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine                sRet = Convert.ToBase64String(encoded);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                rj.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return sRet;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static public String DecryptString(String cypher)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            String sRet = "";Di2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged rj = new RijndaelManaged();Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] message = Convert.FromBase64String(cypher);Di2015NewLine                rj.Key = Key;Di2015NewLine                rj.IV = IV;Di2015NewLine                MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream(message);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                using (CryptoStream cs = new CryptoStream(ms, rj.CreateDecryptor(Key, IV), CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(cs))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        sRet = sr.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine 3313267Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ElapsedEventReceiver : ISynchronizeInvokeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Thread m_Thread;Di2015NewLine    private BlockingCollection<Message> m_Queue = new BlockingCollection<Message>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ElapsedEventReceiver()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_Thread = new Thread(Run);Di2015NewLine        m_Thread.Priority = ThreadPriority.BelowNormal;Di2015NewLine        m_Thread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine        m_Thread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void Run()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (true)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Message message = m_Queue.Take();Di2015NewLine            message.Return = message.Method.DynamicInvoke(message.Args);Di2015NewLine            message.Finished.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IAsyncResult BeginInvoke(Delegate method, object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Message message = new Message();Di2015NewLine        message.Method = method;Di2015NewLine        message.Args = args;Di2015NewLine        m_Queue.Add(message);Di2015NewLine        return message;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object EndInvoke(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Message message = result as Message;Di2015NewLine        if (message != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            message.Finished.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine            return message.Return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("result");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Invoke(Delegate method, object[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Message message = new Message();Di2015NewLine        message.Method = method;Di2015NewLine        message.Args = args;Di2015NewLine        m_Queue.Add(message);Di2015NewLine        message.Finished.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        return message.Return;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool InvokeRequiredDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return Thread.CurrentThread != m_Thread; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private class Message : IAsyncResultDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Delegate Method;Di2015NewLine        public object[] Args;Di2015NewLine        public object Return;Di2015NewLine        public object State;Di2015NewLine        public ManualResetEvent Finished = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object AsyncStateDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return State; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public WaitHandle AsyncWaitHandleDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return Finished; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool CompletedSynchronouslyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return false; }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool IsCompletedDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return Finished.WaitOne(0); }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3316181Di2015UniqueSeparator    static int RoundUpWeird(int rawNr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (rawNr < 100 && rawNr > -100)Di2015NewLine            return RoundUpToNext50(rawNr);Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return RoundUpToNext500(rawNr);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int RoundUpToNext50(int rawNr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return RoundUpToNext(rawNr, 50);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int RoundUpToNext500(int rawNr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return RoundUpToNext(rawNr, 500);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int RoundUpToNext(int rawNr, int next)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int result;Di2015NewLine        int remainder;Di2015NewLine        if ((remainder = rawNr % next) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (rawNr >= 0)Di2015NewLine                result = RoundPositiveToNext(rawNr, next, remainder);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                result = RoundNegativeToNext(rawNr, remainder);Di2015NewLine            if (result < rawNr)Di2015NewLine                throw new OverflowException("round(Number) > Int.MaxValue!");Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return rawNr;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int RoundNegativeToNext(int rawNr, int remainder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return rawNr - remainder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int RoundPositiveToNext(int rawNr, int next, int remainder)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return rawNr + next - remainder;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3320479Di2015UniqueSeparator// UsageDi2015NewLineMonkey monkey = new Monkey() { numberOfEyes = 7, name = "Henry" };Di2015NewLineDog dog = new Dog();Di2015NewLineDynamicCopy.CopyProperties<IAnimal>(monkey, dog);Di2015NewLineDebug.Assert(dog.numberOfEyes == monkey.numberOfEyes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The copierDi2015NewLinepublic static class DynamicCopyDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static void CopyProperties<T>(T source, T target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Helper<T>.CopyProperties(source, target);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static class Helper<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static readonly Action<T, T>[] _copyProps = Prepare();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static Action<T, T>[] Prepare()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type type = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression source = Expression.Parameter(type, "source");Di2015NewLine            ParameterExpression target = Expression.Parameter(type, "target");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var copyProps = from prop in type.GetProperties(BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic)Di2015NewLine                            where prop.CanRead && prop.CanWriteDi2015NewLine                            let getExpr = Expression.Property(source, prop)Di2015NewLine                            let setExpr = Expression.Call(target, prop.GetSetMethod(true), getExpr)Di2015NewLine                            select Expression.Lambda<Action<T, T>>(setExpr, source, target).Compile();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return copyProps.ToArray();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void CopyProperties(T source, T target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (Action<T, T> copyProp in _copyProps)Di2015NewLine                copyProp(source, target);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3322078Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// ListBoxItem Behavior classDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ListBoxItemBehaviorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    #region IsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelectedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the IsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelected valueDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="listBoxItem"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool GetIsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelected(ListBoxItem listBoxItem)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (bool)listBoxItem.GetValue(IsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelectedProperty);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sets the IsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelected valueDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="listBoxItem"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="value"></param>Di2015NewLine    public static void SetIsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelected(Di2015NewLine      ListBoxItem listBoxItem, bool value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        listBoxItem.SetValue(IsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelectedProperty, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determins if the ListBoxItem is bought into view when enabledDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty IsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelectedProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.RegisterAttached(Di2015NewLine        "IsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelected",Di2015NewLine        typeof(bool),Di2015NewLine        typeof(ListBoxItemBehavior),Di2015NewLine        new UIPropertyMetadata(false, OnIsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelectedChanged));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Action to take when item is brought into viewDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="depObj"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="e"></param>Di2015NewLine    static void OnIsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelectedChanged(Di2015NewLine      DependencyObject depObj, DependencyPropertyChangedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ListBoxItem item = depObj as ListBoxItem;Di2015NewLine        if (item == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (e.NewValue is bool == false)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ((bool)e.NewValue)Di2015NewLine            item.Selected += OnListBoxItemSelected;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            item.Selected -= OnListBoxItemSelected;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void OnListBoxItemSelected(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Only react to the Selected event raised by the ListBoxItem Di2015NewLine        // whose IsSelected property was modified.  Ignore all ancestors Di2015NewLine        // who are merely reporting that a descendant's Selected fired. Di2015NewLine        if (!Object.ReferenceEquals(sender, e.OriginalSource))Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ListBoxItem item = e.OriginalSource as ListBoxItem;Di2015NewLine        if (item != null)Di2015NewLine            item.BringIntoView();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion // IsBroughtIntoViewWhenSelectedDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

OpenXmlHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Appends an Embedded Object into the specified Main DocumentDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param embedded</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="displayAsIcon">Whether or not to display the embedded file as an Icon (Otherwise it will display a snapshot of the file)</param>Di2015NewLine    public static void AppendEmbeddedObject(MainDocumentPart mainDocumentPart, FileInfo fileInfo, bool displayAsIcon)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OpenXmlEmbeddedObject openXmlEmbeddedObject = new OpenXmlEmbeddedObject(fileInfo, displayAsIcon);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(openXmlEmbeddedObject.OleObjectBinaryData))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(openXmlEmbeddedObject.OleImageBinaryData))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (Stream emfStream = new MemoryStream(Convert.FromBase64String(openXmlEmbeddedObject.OleImageBinaryData)))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        string imagePartId = GetUniqueXmlItemID();Di2015NewLine                        ImagePart imagePart = mainDocumentPart.AddImagePart(ImagePartType.Emf, imagePartId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (emfStream != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            imagePart.FeedData(emfStream);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        string embeddedPackagePartId = GetUniqueXmlItemID();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (dataStream != null)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            if (openXmlEmbeddedObject.ObjectIsOfficeDocument)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                EmbeddedPackagePart embeddedObjectPart = mainDocumentPart.AddNewPart<EmbeddedPackagePart>(Di2015NewLine                                    openXmlEmbeddedObject.FileContentType, embeddedPackagePartId);Di2015NewLine                                embeddedObjectPart.FeedData(dataStream);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                            elseDi2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                EmbeddedObjectPart embeddedObjectPart = mainDocumentPart.AddNewPart<EmbeddedObjectPart>(Di2015NewLine                                    openXmlEmbeddedObject.FileContentType, embeddedPackagePartId);Di2015NewLine                                embeddedObjectPart.FeedData(dataStream);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (!displayAsIcon && !openXmlEmbeddedObject.ObjectIsPicture)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            Paragraph attachmentHeader = CreateParagraph(String.Format("Attachment: {0} (Double-Click to Open)", fileInfo.Name));Di2015NewLine                            mainDocumentPart.Document.Body.Append(attachmentHeader);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Paragraph embeddedObjectParagraph = GetEmbeededObjectParagraph(openXmlEmbeddedObject.FileType,Di2015NewLine                            imagePartId, openXmlEmbeddedObject.OleImageStyle, embeddedPackagePartId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        mainDocumentPart.Document.Body.Append(embeddedObjectParagraph);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets Paragraph that includes the embedded objectDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private static Paragraph GetEmbeededObjectParagraph(string fileType, string imageID, string imageStyle, string embeddedPackageID)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        EmbeddedObject embeddedObject = new EmbeddedObject();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string shapeID = GetUniqueXmlItemID();Di2015NewLine        V.Shape shape = new V.Shape() { Id = shapeID, Style = imageStyle };Di2015NewLine        V.ImageData imageData = new V.ImageData() { Title = "", RelationshipId = imageID };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        shape.Append(imageData);Di2015NewLine        OVML.OleObject oleObject = new OVML.OleObject()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type = OVML.OleValues.Embed,Di2015NewLine            ProgId = fileType,Di2015NewLine            ShapeId = shapeID,Di2015NewLine            DrawAspect = OVML.OleDrawAspectValues.Icon,Di2015NewLine            ObjectId = GetUniqueXmlItemID(),Di2015NewLine            Id = embeddedPackageIDDi2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        embeddedObject.Append(shape);Di2015NewLine        embeddedObject.Append(oleObject);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Paragraph paragraphImage = new Paragraph();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Run runImage = new Run(embeddedObject);Di2015NewLine        paragraphImage.Append(runImage);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return paragraphImage;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets a Unique ID for an XML Item, for reference purposesDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>A GUID string with removed dashes</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetUniqueXmlItemID()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "r" + System.Guid.NewGuid().ToString().Replace("-", "");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Paragraph CreateParagraph(string paragraphText)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Paragraph paragraph = new Paragraph();Di2015NewLine        ParagraphProperties paragraphProperties = new ParagraphProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        paragraphProperties.Append(new Justification()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Val = JustificationValues.LeftDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        paragraphProperties.Append(new SpacingBetweenLines()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            After = Convert.ToString(100),Di2015NewLine            Line = Convert.ToString(100),Di2015NewLine            LineRule = LineSpacingRuleValues.AtLeastDi2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Run run = new Run();Di2015NewLine        RunProperties runProperties = new RunProperties();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Text text = new Text();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(paragraphText))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            text.Text = paragraphText;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        run.Append(runProperties);Di2015NewLine        run.Append(text);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        paragraph.Append(paragraphProperties);Di2015NewLine        paragraph.Append(run);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return paragraph;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a temporary Word App in order to add an OLE Object, get's the OpenXML data from the file (similar to the Code Reflector info)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void SetupOleFileInformation()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application wordApplication = new Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Application();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.Document wordDocument = wordApplication.Documents.Add(ref _objectMissing, ref _objectMissing,Di2015NewLine            ref _objectMissing, ref _objectMissing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object iconObjectFileName = _objectMissing;Di2015NewLine        object objectClassType = FileType;Di2015NewLine        object objectFilename = _fileInfo.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Microsoft.Office.Interop.Word.InlineShape inlineShape = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_displayAsIcon)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (ObjectIcon != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (FileStream iconStream = new FileStream(ObjectIconFile, FileMode.Create))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ObjectIcon.Save(iconStream);Di2015NewLine                    iconObjectFileName = ObjectIconFile;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            object objectIconLabel = _fileInfo.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            inlineShape = wordDocument.InlineShapes.AddOLEObject(ref objectClassType,Di2015NewLine                ref objectFilename, ref _objectFalse, ref _objectTrue, ref iconObjectFileName,Di2015NewLine                ref _objectMissing, ref objectIconLabel, ref _objectMissing);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Image image = Image.FromFile(_fileInfo.ToString());Di2015NewLine                _objectIsPicture = true;Di2015NewLine                OleImageStyle = String.Format("height:{0}pt;width:{1}pt", image.Height, image.Width);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                wordDocument.InlineShapes.AddPicture(_fileInfo.ToString(), ref _objectMissing, ref _objectTrue, ref _objectMissing);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catchDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                inlineShape = wordDocument.InlineShapes.AddOLEObject(ref objectClassType,Di2015NewLine                    ref objectFilename, ref _objectFalse, ref _objectFalse, ref _objectMissing, ref _objectMissing,Di2015NewLine                    ref _objectMissing, ref _objectMissing);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WordOpenXml = wordDocument.Range(ref _objectMissing, ref _objectMissing).WordOpenXML;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (_objectIsPicture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OleObjectBinaryData = GetPictureBinaryData();Di2015NewLine            OleImageBinaryData = GetPictureBinaryData();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            OleObjectBinaryData = GetOleBinaryData(_oleObjectDataTag);Di2015NewLine            OleImageBinaryData = GetOleBinaryData(_oleImageDataTag);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Not sure why, but Excel seems to hang in the processes if you attach an Excel fileDi2015NewLine        // This kills the excel process that has been started < 15 seconds ago (so not to kill the user's other Excel processes that may be open)Di2015NewLine        if (FileType.StartsWith("Excel"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Process[] processes = Process.GetProcessesByName("EXCEL");Di2015NewLine            foreach (Process process in processes)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (DateTime.Now.Subtract(process.StartTime).Seconds <= 15)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    process.Kill();Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        wordDocument.Close(ref _objectFalse, ref _objectMissing, ref _objectMissing);Di2015NewLine        wordApplication.Quit(ref _objectMissing, ref _objectMissing, ref _objectMissing);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the binary data from the Xml File that is associated with the Tag passed inDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="binaryDataXmlTag">the Tag to look for in the OpenXml</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private string GetOleBinaryData(string binaryDataXmlTag)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string binaryData = null;Di2015NewLine        if (BinaryDataXmlNodesList != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (XmlNode xmlNode in BinaryDataXmlNodesList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (xmlNode.ParentNode != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (XmlAttribute attr in xmlNode.ParentNode.Attributes)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        if (String.IsNullOrEmpty(binaryData) && attr.Value.Contains(binaryDataXmlTag))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            binaryData = xmlNode.InnerText;Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return binaryData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the image Binary data, if the file is an imageDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private string GetPictureBinaryData()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string binaryData = null;Di2015NewLine        if (BinaryDataXmlNodesList != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (XmlNode xmlNode in BinaryDataXmlNodesList)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                binaryData = xmlNode.InnerText;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return binaryData;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the file type description ("Application", "Text Document", etc.) for the file.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fileInfo">FileInfo containing extention</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Type Description</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static string GetFileType(FileInfo fileInfo, bool returnDescription)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (fileInfo == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("fileInfo");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string description = "File";Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(fileInfo.Extension))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return description;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        description = string.Format("{0} File", fileInfo.Extension.Substring(1).ToUpper());Di2015NewLine        RegistryKey typeKey = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey(fileInfo.Extension);Di2015NewLine        if (typeKey == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return description;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        string type = Convert.ToString(typeKey.GetValue(string.Empty));Di2015NewLine        RegistryKey key = Registry.ClassesRoot.OpenSubKey(type);Di2015NewLine        if (key == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return description;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (returnDescription)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            description = Convert.ToString(key.GetValue(string.Empty));Di2015NewLine            return description;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return type;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregion MethodsDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3325010Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing Excel = Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ExcelTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Excel.Application excelapplication = null;Di2015NewLine            Excel.Workbook workbook = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                excelapplication = new Excel.Application();Di2015NewLine                workbook = excelapplication.Workbooks.Open(args[0]);Di2015NewLine                var errors = new Dictionary<string, List<string>>();Di2015NewLine                foreach (Excel.Worksheet sheet in workbook.Sheets)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    int rowCount = sheet.UsedRange.Cells.Rows.Count;Di2015NewLine                    int colCount = sheet.UsedRange.Cells.Columns.Count;Di2015NewLine                    var usedCells = sheet.UsedRange.Cells;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    for (int i = 1; i <= rowCount; i++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (int j = 1; j <= cellErrors;Di2015NewLine                            if (HasNonDefaultFont(range, out cellErrors))Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (!IsHeaderCell(workbook, range))Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    string cellDisplayTitle = String.Format("{0}!{1}", sheet.Name, range.Address);Di2015NewLine                                    errors[cellDisplayTitle] = cellErrors;Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                ReportErrors(errors);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            finallyDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (workbook != null)Di2015NewLine                    workbook.Close();Di2015NewLine                if (excelapplication != null)Di2015NewLine                    excelapplication.Quit();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static bool HasNonDefaultFont(Excel.Range range, out List<string> differences)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            differences = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (range.Font.Color != 0.0)Di2015NewLine                differences.Add("Has font-color");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (range.Font.Bold)Di2015NewLine                differences.Add("Is bold");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (range.Font.Italic)Di2015NewLine                differences.Add("Is italic");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (range.Font.Underline != (int)Microsoft.Office.Interop.Excel.XlUnderlineStyle.xlUnderlineStyleNone)Di2015NewLine                differences.Add("Is underline");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (range.Font.Strikethrough)Di2015NewLine                differences.Add("Is strikethrough");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (range.Font.Name != "Arial")Di2015NewLine                differences.Add(String.Format("Font is {0}", range.Font.Name));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (range.Font.Size != 10)Di2015NewLine                differences.Add(String.Format("Font size is {0}", range.Font.Size));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return differences.Count != 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static bool IsHeaderCell(Excel.Workbook workbook, Excel.Range range)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Look through workbook names:Di2015NewLine            foreach (Excel.Name namedRange in workbook.Names)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (range.Parent == namedRange.RefersToRange.Parent && range.Application.Intersect(range, namedRange.RefersToRange) != null)Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Look through worksheet-names.Di2015NewLine            foreach (Excel.Name namedRange in range.Worksheet.Names)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (range.Parent == namedRange.RefersToRange.Parent && range.Worksheet.Application.Intersect(range, namedRange.RefersToRange) != null)Di2015NewLine                    return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void ReportErrors(Dictionary<string, List<string>> errors)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (errors.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Found the following errors:");Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("---------------------------------");Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0,-15} | Error", "Cell");Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("---------------------------------");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (KeyValuePair<string, List<string>> kv in errors)Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("{0,-15} | {1}", kv.Key, kv.Value.Aggregate((e, s) => e + ", " + s));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3325032Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Continuation {Di2015NewLine      public Continuation ();Di2015NewLine      public void Mark ();Di2015NewLine      public int Store (int state);Di2015NewLine      public void Restore (int state);Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
3325032Di2015UniqueSeparator    public Continuation()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        m_handle = alloc_continuation();Di2015NewLine        Print("Continuation()");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Mark()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Print("Mark()");Di2015NewLine        // skip 1 frame, ie. this functionDi2015NewLine        mark_continuation_frame(m_handle, 1);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Store(int data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Print("Store({0})", data);Di2015NewLine        int res = store_continuation(m_handle, data);Di2015NewLine        Print("Store({0}) = {1}", data, res);Di2015NewLine        return res;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Restore(int data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Print("Restore({0})", data);Di2015NewLine        restore_continuation(m_handle, data);Di2015NewLine        Print("Restore() exit (NEVER REACHED)");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3327942Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Spiral(int[,] m)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int n = m.GetUpperBound(0);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n / 2; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int j = i; j <= n - i; ++j)Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(m[i, j] + " ");Di2015NewLine            for (int j = i + 1; j <= n - i; ++j)Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(m[j, n - i] + " ");Di2015NewLine            for (int j = i + 1; j <= n - i; ++j)Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(m[n - i, n - j] + " ");Di2015NewLine            for (int j = i + 1; j < n - i; ++j)Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(m[n - j, i] + " ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.Write(m[n / 2, n / 2]+" ");Di2015NewLine        if (n % 2 == 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(m[n / 2, n / 2+1] + " ");Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(m[n / 2+1, n / 2+1] + " ");Di2015NewLine            Console.Write(m[n / 2+1, n / 2] + " ");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int[,] myArray = new int[,]{Di2015NewLine            {11, 12, 13, 14, 15},Di2015NewLine            {21, 22, 23, 24, 25},Di2015NewLine            {31, 32, 33, 34, 35},Di2015NewLine            {41, 42, 43, 44, 45},Di2015NewLine            {51, 52, 53, 54, 55}Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine        Spiral(myArray);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3328239Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string CJ()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string Id = GenerateId("cust", "cust_id", 6, "ELG", true);Di2015NewLine        return Id;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public string GenerateId(string TableName, string ColumnName, int ColumnLength, string Prefix, bool Padding)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string Query, con, Id;Di2015NewLine        con = "Data Source=CJ\\\\SQLEXPRESS;Initial Catalog=seq;Persist Security Info=True;User ID=sa;Password=123";Di2015NewLine        SqlConnection cn = new SqlConnection(con);Di2015NewLine        int preLength,padLength;Di2015NewLine        preLength = Convert.ToInt32(Prefix.Length);Di2015NewLine        padLength = ColumnLength - preLength;Di2015NewLine        if (Padding == true )Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine             Query = "SELECT '" + Prefix + "' + REPLACE(STR(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(" + ColumnName + "," + Convert.ToString(preLength + 1) + "," + padLength + ") AS INTEGER))+1," + padLength + "),' ',0) FROM " + TableName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Query = "SELECT '" + Prefix + "' + CAST(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING(" + ColumnName + "," + Convert.ToString(preLength + 1) + "," + padLength + ") AS INTEGER))+1 AS VARCHAR) FROM " + TableName;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        SqlCommand com = new SqlCommand(Query, cn);Di2015NewLine        cn.Open();Di2015NewLine        if (com.ExecuteScalar().ToString() == "")Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Id = Prefix;Di2015NewLine            if (Padding == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 1; i  padLength - 1; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Id += "0";Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Id += "1";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Id = Convert.ToString(com.ExecuteScalar());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        cn.Close();Di2015NewLine        return Id;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3333462Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static AutoResetEvent _autoResetEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int parentProcessId = int.Parse(args[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _autoResetEvent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        WaitCallback callback = delegate(object processId) { CheckProcess((int)processId); };Di2015NewLine        ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(callback, parentProcessId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _autoResetEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void CheckProcess(int processId)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Process process = Process.GetProcessById(processId);Di2015NewLine            process.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Process [{0}] exited.", processId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ArgumentException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Process [{0}] not running.", processId);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _autoResetEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3333462Di2015UniqueSeparatorProcess.Exited
3333462Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Diagnostics;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static AutoResetEvent _autoResetEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int parentProcessId = int.Parse(args[0]);Di2015NewLine        Process process = Process.GetProcessById(parentProcessId);Di2015NewLine        process.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLine        process.Exited += new EventHandler(process_Exited);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _autoResetEvent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine        _autoResetEvent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void process_Exited(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Process exit event triggered.");Di2015NewLine        _autoResetEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3336736Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic IProvider ProviderFactoryMethodHere(Type providerRequested)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Dictionary <Type, IProvider> providerDict;Di2015NewLine    if (providerDict == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // populate dictionary with providers, keyed by their typeDi2015NewLine      providerDict = new Dictionary<Type, IProvider>();Di2015NewLine      providerDict.Add(typeof(Provider1), new Provider1());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // repeat for all providers, this is pretty simple but definitely worksDi2015NewLine      // we could use other ways of holding on to your provider instancesDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (providerDict.HasKey(providerRequested))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return providerDict[providerRequested];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // could throw exception here if you want to use that kind of errorDi2015NewLine    // handling, but we'll just return null for nowDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3338305Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ThreadTestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Supervisor supervisor = new Supervisor();Di2015NewLine            supervisor.LaunchThreads();Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            supervisor.KillActiveThreads();Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public delegate void WorkerCallbackDelegate(int threadIdArg);Di2015NewLine        public static object locker = new object();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        class SupervisorDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Queue<Thread> pendingThreads = new Queue<Thread>();Di2015NewLine            Dictionary<int, Worker> activeWorkers = new Dictionary<int, Worker>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void LaunchThreads()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < 20; i++)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Worker worker = new Worker();Di2015NewLine                    worker.DoneCallBack = new WorkerCallbackDelegate(WorkerCallback);Di2015NewLine                    Thread thread = new Thread(worker.DoWork);Di2015NewLine                    thread.IsBackground = true;Di2015NewLine                    thread.Start();Di2015NewLine                    lock (locker)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        activeWorkers.Add(thread.ManagedThreadId, worker);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void KillActiveThreads()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (locker)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    foreach (Worker worker in activeWorkers.Values)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        worker.StopWork();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void WorkerCallback(int threadIdArg)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lock (locker)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    activeWorkers.Remove(threadIdArg);Di2015NewLine                    if (activeWorkers.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("no more active threads");Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        class WorkerDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public WorkerCallbackDelegate DoneCallBack { get; set; }Di2015NewLine            volatile bool quitEarly;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void DoWork()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                quitEarly = false;Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId.ToString() + " started");Di2015NewLine                DateTime startTime = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine                while (!quitEarly && ((DateTime.Now - startTime).TotalSeconds < new Random().Next(1, 10)))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Thread.Sleep(1000);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId.ToString() + " stopped");Di2015NewLine                DoneCallBack(Thread.CurrentThread.ManagedThreadId);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public void StopWork()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                quitEarly = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3342936Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class IEnumerablExtensionsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Will iterate the graph in depth first orderDi2015NewLine            public static IEnumerable<TResult> Select<TResult>(this IEnumerable collection, Func<Node, TResult> selector)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var obj in collection)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var node = obj as Node;Di2015NewLine                    if (node != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        yield return selector(node);Di2015NewLine                        foreach (var n in node.Nodes.Select(selector))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                           yield return n;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<Node> Where(this IEnumerable collection, Predicate<Node> pred)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (var node in collection.Select(x => x)) //iterate the list in graph first orderDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (pred(node))Di2015NewLine                    yield return node;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
3343032Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function OKToInsertSorted(ByVal theArrayList As ArrayList, _Di2015NewLine                                  ByVal stringToInsert As String) As BooleanDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    With theArrayListDi2015NewLine        If CInt(stringToInsert) < CInt(.Item(.Count - 1)) Then Return FalseDi2015NewLine        If .Count <= 1 ThenDi2015NewLine            If stringToInsert = "1" Then Return True Else Return FalseDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine        If .Item(.Count - 1).ToString = .Item(.Count - 2).ToString ThenDi2015NewLine            Return TrueDi2015NewLine        ElseDi2015NewLine            Return FalseDi2015NewLine        End IfDi2015NewLine    End WithDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine
3343032Di2015UniqueSeparatorPrivate Function OKToInsertUNSorted(ByVal theArrayList As ArrayList, _Di2015NewLine                                    ByVal stringToInsert As String) As BooleanDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    If stringToInsert = "1" Then Return TrueDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim stringToCheck As String = CStr(CInt(stringToInsert) - 1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Dim qry = From stringItem In theArrayList _Di2015NewLine              Where stringItem.ToString = stringToCheck _Di2015NewLine              Group By stringItem Into _Di2015NewLine              stringCount = Count()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    For Each result In qryDi2015NewLine        If result.stringCount >= 2 Then Return TrueDi2015NewLine    NextDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Return FalseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd FunctionDi2015NewLine

Form.ShowDialog();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineBackgroundWorker worker = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void ProgressBarForm_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Initialize the background worker.Di2015NewLine    worker = new BackgroundWorker();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Indicate that the worker supports progress.Di2015NewLine    worker.WorkerSupportsProgress = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Subscribe to the DoWork event.Di2015NewLine    worker.DoWork += (s, e) => {Di2015NewLine        // Create the pizza instance.Di2015NewLine        Pizza = new Pizza();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Process the slices.Di2015NewLine        foreach (var Slice in Pizza)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Clear the slice.Di2015NewLine            Slice.Clear();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Report the progress.Di2015NewLine            worker.ReportProgress(Slice.Index / Pizza.Count() * 100);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Subscribe to the ProgressChanged event.Di2015NewLine    worker.ProgressChanged = (s, e) => {Di2015NewLine        // Update the progress bar.Di2015NewLine        PizzaEatingProgressBar.Value = e.ProgressPercentage;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Subscribe to the RunWorkerCompleted event.Di2015NewLine    worker.RunWorkerCompleted = (s, e) => {Di2015NewLine        // Close the dislog.Di2015NewLine        this.Close();Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Must override to properly dispose of the background worker.Di2015NewLineprotected override void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Call the base.Di2015NewLine    base.Disposing(disposing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Dispose of the background worker if disposing is true.Di2015NewLine    if (disposing) worker.Dispose();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3349159Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dynamic person = new { Name = "Peter" };Di2015NewLine        var p = DuckType.As<IPerson>(person);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(p.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic interface IPersonDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class DuckTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static readonly ProxyGenerator generator = new ProxyGenerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static T As<T>(object o)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return generator.CreateInterfaceProxyWithoutTarget<T>(new DuckTypingInterceptor(o));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class DuckTypingInterceptor : IInterceptorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly object target;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DuckTypingInterceptor(object target)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.target = target;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Intercept(IInvocation invocation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var methods = target.GetType().GetMethods()Di2015NewLine            .Where(m => m.Name == invocation.Method.Name)Di2015NewLine            .Where(m => m.GetParameters().Length == invocation.Arguments.Length)Di2015NewLine            .ToList();Di2015NewLine        if (methods.Count > 1)Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("Ambiguous method match for '{0}'", invocation.Method.Name));Di2015NewLine        if (methods.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new ApplicationException(string.Format("No method '{0}' found", invocation.Method.Name));Di2015NewLine        var method = methods[0];Di2015NewLine        if (invocation.GenericArguments != null && invocation.GenericArguments.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            method = method.MakeGenericMethod(invocation.GenericArguments);Di2015NewLine        invocation.ReturnValue = method.Invoke(target, invocation.Arguments);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3349654Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate HttpCookie GetCookie()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // based on the php example at http://developers.facebook.com/docs/guides/canvas/#canvasDi2015NewLine    HttpCookie cookie = Request.Cookies["fbs_" + FacebookClientId];Di2015NewLine    if (cookie != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var pairs = from pair in cookie.Value.Trim('"', '\\\\').Split('&')Di2015NewLine                    let indexOfEquals = pair.IndexOf('=')Di2015NewLine                    orderby pairDi2015NewLine                    select newDi2015NewLine                               {Di2015NewLine                                   Key = pair.Substring(0, indexOfEquals).Trim(),Di2015NewLine                                   Value = pair.Substring(indexOfEquals + 1).Trim()Di2015NewLine                               };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        IDictionary<string, string> cookieValues =Di2015NewLine            pairs.ToDictionary(pair => pair.Key, pair => Server.UrlDecode(pair.Value));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        StringBuilder payload = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<string, string> pair in cookieValues)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Response.Write(pair.Key + ": " + pair.Value + "<br/>\\n");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (pair.Key != "sig")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                payload.Append(pair.Key + "=" + pair.Value);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string sig = cookieValues["sig"];Di2015NewLine        string hash = GetMd5Hash(payload + FacebookSecret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (sig == hash)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return cookie;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string GetMd5Hash(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MD5CryptoServiceProvider cryptoServiceProvider = new MD5CryptoServiceProvider();Di2015NewLine    byte[] bytes = Encoding.Default.GetBytes(input);Di2015NewLine    byte[] hash = cryptoServiceProvider.ComputeHash(bytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder s = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (byte b in hash)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        s.Append(b.ToString("x2"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return s.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3352127Di2015UniqueSeparator        private static void Enc(string decryptedFileName, string encryptedFileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PasswordDeriveBytes passwordDB = new PasswordDeriveBytes("ThisIsMyPassword", Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("thisIsMysalt!"), "MD5", 2);Di2015NewLine            byte[] passwordBytes = passwordDB.GetBytes(128 / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fsOutput = File.OpenWrite(encryptedFileName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using(FileStream fsInput = File.OpenRead(decryptedFileName))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte[] IVBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("1234567890123456");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    fsOutput.Write(BitConverter.GetBytes(fsInput.Length), 0, 8);Di2015NewLine                    fsOutput.Write(IVBytes, 0, 16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged() { Mode = CipherMode.CBC,Padding=PaddingMode.ANSIX923};Di2015NewLine                    ICryptoTransform encryptor = symmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(passwordBytes, IVBytes);                   Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(fsOutput, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (long i = 0; i < fsInput.Length; i += chunkSize)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            byte[] chunkData = new byte[chunkSize];Di2015NewLine                            int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine                            while ((bytesRead = fsInput.Read(chunkData, 0, chunkSize)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                if (bytesRead != 16)Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    for (int x = bytesRead - 1; x < chunkSize; x++)Di2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        chunkData[x] = 0;Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                                cryptoStream.Write(chunkData, 0, chunkSize);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        cryptoStream.FlushFinalBlock();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }            Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private static void Dec(string encryptedFileName, string decryptedFileName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            PasswordDeriveBytes passwordDB = new PasswordDeriveBytes("ThisIsMyPassword", Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("thisIsMysalt!"), "MD5", 2);Di2015NewLine            byte[] passwordBytes = passwordDB.GetBytes(128 / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (FileStream fsInput = File.OpenRead(encryptedFileName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (FileStream fsOutput = File.OpenWrite(decryptedFileName))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    byte[] buffer = new byte[8];Di2015NewLine                    fsInput.Read(buffer, 0, 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    long fileLength = BitConverter.ToInt64(buffer, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    byte[] IVBytes = new byte[16];Di2015NewLine                    fsInput.Read(IVBytes, 0, 16);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged() { Mode = CipherMode.CBC,Padding=PaddingMode.ANSIX923};Di2015NewLine                    ICryptoTransform decryptor = symmetricKey.CreateDecryptor(passwordBytes, IVBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    using (CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(fsOutput, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        for (long i = 0; i < fsInput.Length; i += chunkSize)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            byte[] chunkData = new byte[chunkSize];Di2015NewLine                            int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine                            while ((bytesRead = fsInput.Read(chunkData, 0, chunkSize)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                cryptoStream.Write(chunkData, 0, bytesRead);Di2015NewLine 3352146Di2015UniqueSeparator    void s_PreviewMouseLeftButtonDown(object sender, MouseButtonEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (sender is ListBoxItem)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ListBoxItem draggedItem = sender as ListBoxItem;Di2015NewLine            DragDrop.DoDragDrop(draggedItem, draggedItem.DataContext, DragDropEffects.Move);Di2015NewLine            draggedItem.IsSelected = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void listbox1_Drop(object sender, DragEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Emp droppedData = e.Data.GetData(typeof(Emp)) as Emp;Di2015NewLine        Emp target = ((ListBoxItem)(sender)).DataContext as Emp;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int removedIdx = listbox1.Items.IndexOf(droppedData);Di2015NewLine        int targetIdx = listbox1.Items.IndexOf(target);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (removedIdx < targetIdx)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _empList.Insert(targetIdx + 1, droppedData);Di2015NewLine            _empList.RemoveAt(removedIdx);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int remIdx = removedIdx+1;Di2015NewLine            if (_empList.Count + 1 > remIdx)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _empList.Insert(targetIdx, droppedData);Di2015NewLine                _empList.RemoveAt(remIdx);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3352375Di2015UniqueSeparatorFormsAuthenticationTicket
3352375Di2015UniqueSeparator// Retrieves the cookie that contains your custom FormsAuthenticationTicket.Di2015NewLineHttpCookie authCookie = HttpContext.Current.Request.Cookies[FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Decrypts the FormsAuthenticationTicket that is held in the cookie's .Value property.Di2015NewLineFormsAuthenticationTicket authTicket = FormsAuthentication.Decrypt(authCookie.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The "authTicket" variable now contains your original, custom FormsAuthenticationTicket,Di2015NewLine// complete with User-specific custom data.  You can then check that the FormsAuthenticationTicket'sDi2015NewLine// .Name property is for the correct user, and perform the relevant functions with the ticket.Di2015NewLine// Here, we simply write the user-specific data to the Http Response stream.Di2015NewLineif (authTicket.Name == txtUserName.Text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Response.Write(authTicket.UserData);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3352375Di2015UniqueSeparator<%@ Page Language="C#" %>Di2015NewLine<%@ Import Namespace="System.Web.Security" %>Di2015NewLine<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Transitional//EN"Di2015NewLine    "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-transitional.dtd">Di2015NewLine<script runat="server">Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void Page_Load(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double Timeout = 15.00;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!IsPostBack)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            FormsAuthenticationTicket authTicket = new FormsAuthenticationTicket(1,txtUserName.Text,Di2015NewLine                    DateTime.Now,DateTime.Now.AddMinutes(Timeout), false, "This is my secret user-specific data");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string encryptedTicket = FormsAuthentication.Encrypt(authTicket);Di2015NewLine            HttpCookie authCookie = new HttpCookie(FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName,encryptedTicket);Di2015NewLine            HttpContext.Current.Response.Cookies.Add(authCookie);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Retrieves the cookie that contains your custom FormsAuthenticationTicket.Di2015NewLine            HttpCookie authCookie = HttpContext.Current.Request.Cookies[FormsAuthentication.FormsCookieName];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Decrypts the FormsAuthenticationTicket that is held in the cookie's .Value property.Di2015NewLine            FormsAuthenticationTicket authTicket = FormsAuthentication.Decrypt(authCookie.Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // The "authTicket" variable now contains your original, custom FormsAuthenticationTicket,Di2015NewLine            // complete with User-specific custom data. Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinenamespace YariIfStreamDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// A class that manages three buffers used for IF data writing</value>Di2015NewLine        private byte[] readbuf; ///<value>The buffer used for reading</value>Di2015NewLine        private byte[] swapbuf; ///<value>The buffer used for ///<value>Object used for syncing</value>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Initializes a new instance of the Yari.YariIFStream class with expandable buffers with capacity)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sync = new Object();Di2015NewLine            firsttime = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            writebuf = new byte[capacity];Di2015NewLine            readbuf = new byte[capacity];Di2015NewLine            swapbuf = new byte[capacity];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// Returns the swapbuf;Di2015NewLine                swapbuf = readbuf;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            readbuf = tempbuf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return readbuf;Di2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine                tempbuf = swapbuf;Di2015NewLine                swapbuf = writebuf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                writebuf = tempbuf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine {Di2015NewLine                    firsttime = false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return writebuf;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
