3354897Di2015UniqueSeparatorCryptoStream
3354897Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Enc(string decryptedFileName, string encryptedFileName)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    PasswordDeriveBytes passwordDB = new PasswordDeriveBytes("ThisIsMyPassword", Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("thisIsMysalt!"), "MD5", 2);Di2015NewLine    byte[] passwordBytes = passwordDB.GetBytes(128 / 8);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (FileStream fsOutput = File.OpenWrite(encryptedFileName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using(FileStream fsInput = File.OpenRead(decryptedFileName))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] IVBytes = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes("1234567890123456");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            RijndaelManaged symmetricKey = new RijndaelManaged() { Mode = CipherMode.CBC,Padding=PaddingMode.Zeros};Di2015NewLine            ICryptoTransform encryptor = symmetricKey.CreateEncryptor(passwordBytes, IVBytes);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (CryptoStream cryptoStream = new CryptoStream(fsOutput, encryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Write))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] chunkData = new byte[chunkSize];Di2015NewLine                int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLine                while ((bytesRead = fsInput.Read(chunkData, 0, chunkSize)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    cryptoStream.Write(chunkData, 0, bytesRead);  //KEY FIXDi2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }            Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3357083Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool HasTwoOrMoreInEachGroup(IEnumerable<GroupSelect> enumerable)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var groups = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (GroupSelect item in enumerable)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int count = 0;Di2015NewLine        if (groups.TryGetValue(item.GroupNo, out count))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            groups[item.GroupNo] = count + 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            groups.Add(item.GroupNo, 1);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (int count in groups.Values)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (count <= 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3365388Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic float NextFloat(Random random)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double mantissa = (random.NextDouble() * 2.0) - 1.0;Di2015NewLine    double exponent = Math.Pow(2.0, random.Next(-126, 128));Di2015NewLine    return (float)(mantissa * exponent);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3365388Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic float NextFloat(Random random)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var buffer = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine    random.NextBytes(buffer);Di2015NewLine    return BitConverter.ToSingle(buffer,0);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3365388Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic float NextFloat(Random random)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Not a uniform distribution w.r.t. the binary floating-point number lineDi2015NewLine    // which makes sense given that NextDouble is uniform from 0.0 to 1.0.Di2015NewLine    // Uniform w.r.t. a continuous number line.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // The range produced by this method is 6.8e38.Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // Therefore if NextDouble produces values in the range of 0.0 to 0.1Di2015NewLine    // 10% of the time, we will only produce numbers less than 1e38 aboutDi2015NewLine    // 10% of the time, which does not make sense.Di2015NewLine    var result = (random.NextDouble()Di2015NewLine                  * (Single.MaxValue - (double)Single.MinValue))Di2015NewLine                  + Single.MinValue;Di2015NewLine    return (float)result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3368608Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Stack<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int _defaultSize = 4;Di2015NewLine    private const int _growthMultiplier = 2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private T[] _elements;Di2015NewLine    private int _index;Di2015NewLine    private int _limit;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Stack()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _elements = new T[_defaultSize];Di2015NewLine        _index = -1;Di2015NewLine        _limit = _elements.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Push(T item)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_index == _limit)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var temp = _elements;Di2015NewLine            _elements = new T[_elements.Length * _growthMultiplier];Di2015NewLine            _limit = _elements.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine            Array.Copy(temp, _elements, temp.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _elements[++_index] = item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public T Pop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (_index < 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var item = _elements[_index];Di2015NewLine        _elements[_index--] = default(T);Di2015NewLine        return item;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Clear()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _index = -1;Di2015NewLine        Array.Clear(_elements, 0, _elements.Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3369494Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string BuildURLAndNavigate()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var uriBuilder = new UriBuilder("http://some.com/nav/somepage.asp");Di2015NewLine    var values = new HttpNameValueCollection();Di2015NewLine    values.Add("app", "myapp");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (codeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case CodeType.Series:Di2015NewLine            values.Add("tools", "ser");Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        case CodeType.DataType:Di2015NewLine            values.Add("tools", "dt");Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // You could even do things like this without breaking your urlsDi2015NewLine    values.Add("p", "http://www.example.com?p1=v1&p2=v2");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string VER_NUM = "5.0";Di2015NewLine    values.Add("vsn", VER_NUM);Di2015NewLine    uriBuilder.Query = values.ToString();Di2015NewLine    return uriBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3372644Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text;Di2015NewLineusing iTextSharp.text.pdf;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// return processed stream (a new MemoryStream) Di2015NewLinepublic Stream copyAnnotations(Stream sourcePdfStream, Stream destinationPdfStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create new document (IText)Di2015NewLine    Document outdoc = new Document(PageSize.A4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Seek to Stream start and create Reader for input PDFDi2015NewLine    m.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine    PdfReader inputPdfReader = new PdfReader(sourcePdfStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Seek to Stream start and create Reader for destination PDFDi2015NewLine    m.Seek(0, SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine    PdfReader destinationPdfReader = new PdfReader(destinationPdfStream);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create a PdfWriter from for new a pdf destination streamDi2015NewLine    // You should write into a new stream here!Di2015NewLine    Stream processedPdf = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine    PdfWriter pdfw = PdfWriter.GetInstance(outdoc, processedPdf);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // do not close stream if we've read everythingDi2015NewLine    pdfw.CloseStream = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Open documentDi2015NewLine    outdoc.Open();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // get number of pagesDi2015NewLine    int numPagesIn = inputPdfReader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLine    int numPagesOut = destinationPdfReader.NumberOfPages;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int max = numPagesIn;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Process max number of pagesDi2015NewLine    if (max<numPagesOut)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception("Impossible - different number of pages");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    int i = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Process Pdf pagesDi2015NewLine    while (i < max)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Import pages from corresponding readerDi2015NewLine        PdfImportedPage pageIn = writer.inputPdfReader(reader, i);Di2015NewLine        PdfImportedPage pageOut = writer.destinationPdfReader(reader, i);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get named destinations (annotationsDi2015NewLine        List<Annotations> toBeAdded = ParseInAndOutAndGetAnnotations(pageIn, pageOut);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // add your annotationsDi2015NewLine        foreach (Annotation anno in toBeAdded) pageOut.Add(anno);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add processed page to output PDFWriterDi2015NewLine        outdoc.Add(pageOut);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // PDF creation finishedDi2015NewLine    outdoc.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // your new destination stream is processedPdfDi2015NewLine    return processedPdf;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3377163Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ColumnComparer : IEqualityComparer<object[]>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IList<int> _comparedIndexes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ColumnComparer(params int[] comparedIndexes)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _comparedIndexes = comparedIndexes.ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IEqualityComparerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(object[] x, object[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ReferenceEquals(x, y) || (x != null && y != null && ColumnsEqual(x, y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(object[] obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return obj == null ? 0 : CombineColumnHashCodes(obj);Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool ColumnsEqual(object[] x, object[] y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _comparedIndexes.All(index => ColumnEqual(x, y, index));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool ColumnEqual(object[] x, object[] y, int index)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(x[index], y[index]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private int CombineColumnHashCodes(object[] row)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _comparedIndexesDi2015NewLine            .Select(index => row[index])Di2015NewLine            .Aggregate(0, (hashCode, value) => hashCode ^ (value == null ? 0 : value.GetHashCode()));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3377163Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IGrouping<object[], object[]> GroupByIndexes(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<object[]> source,Di2015NewLine    params int[] indexes)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.GroupBy(row => row, new ColumnComparer(indexes));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// UsageDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinerow.GroupByIndexes(0, 1, 2)Di2015NewLine

3377858Di2015UniqueSeparator    static string getPropertyValueFromProperty(object control, string propertyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var controlType = control.GetType();Di2015NewLine        var property = controlType.GetProperty(propertyName, BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic);Di2015NewLine        if (property == null)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("Property {0}? does not exist in type {1}?.", propertyName, controlType.FullName));Di2015NewLine        if (property.PropertyType != typeof(string))Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException(string.Format("Property {0}? in type {1}? does not have the type string?.", propertyName, controlType.FullName));Di2015NewLine        return (string) property.GetValue(control, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3378155Di2015UniqueSeparator// Define the assembly and the module.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineAppDomain appDomain = AppDomain.CurrentDomain;Di2015NewLineAssemblyName assemblyName = new AssemblyName("EmittedAssembly");Di2015NewLineAssemblyBuilder assembly = appDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLineassemblyName, AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// An assembly is made up of executable modules. For a single-moduleDi2015NewLine// assembly, the module name and file name are the same as the Di2015NewLine// assembly name. Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineModuleBuilder module = assembly.DefineDynamicModule(Di2015NewLineassemblyName.Name, assemblyName.Name + ".dll");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine// Declare the types (classes).Di2015NewLine// Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Declare the class "ClassA"Di2015NewLineTypeBuilder classA = module.DefineType("ClassA", TypeAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLine// Declare the class "ClassB"Di2015NewLineTypeBuilder classB = module.DefineType("ClassB", TypeAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define the fields stringField, classBFieldDi2015NewLineFieldBuilder stringField = classA.DefineField("stringField",Di2015NewLinetypeof(string), FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLineFieldBuilder classBField = classA.DefineField("classBField",Di2015NewLineclassB, FieldAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine// Define the property ClassBPropertyDi2015NewLinePropertyBuilder classBProperty = classA.DefineProperty(Di2015NewLine    "ClassBProperty", PropertyAttributes.None, classB, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// The special set of attributes for the property set&get methodsDi2015NewLineMethodAttributes getSetAttr = MethodAttributes.Public |Di2015NewLine    MethodAttributes.SpecialName | MethodAttributes.HideBySig;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define the "get" accessor method for ClassBPropertyDi2015NewLineMethodBuilder classBGetProp = classA.DefineMethod(Di2015NewLine    "get_ClassBProperty", getSetAttr, classB, Type.EmptyTypes);Di2015NewLineILGenerator classBGetIL = classBGetProp.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineclassBGetIL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLineclassBGetIL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, classBField);Di2015NewLineclassBGetIL.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define the "set" accessor method for ClassBPropertyDi2015NewLineMethodBuilder classBSetProp = classA.DefineMethod(Di2015NewLine    "set_ClassBProperty", getSetAttr, null, new Type[] { classB });Di2015NewLineILGenerator sampleSetIL = classBSetProp.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLinesampleSetIL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLinesampleSetIL.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLinesampleSetIL.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, classBField);Di2015NewLinesampleSetIL.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Map the get&set methods to PropertyBuilderDi2015NewLineclassBProperty.SetGetMethod(classBGetProp);Di2015NewLineclassBProperty.SetSetMethod(classBSetProp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine// Define a method that uses the classBFieldDi2015NewLineMethodBuilder classAMethod = classA.DefineMethod("ClassAMethod", Di2015NewLine    MethodAttributes.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define the list generics and ienumerable genericDi2015NewLineType listOf = typeof(List<>);Di2015NewLineType enumOf = typeof(IEnumerable<>);Di2015NewLineType listOfClassA = listOf.MakeGenericType(classA);Di2015NewLineType enumOfClassA = enumOf.MakeGenericType(classA);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Define the method, ClassBMethod, for ClassBDi2015NewLineMethodBuilder classBMethod = classB.DefineMethod("ClassBMethod", Di2015NewLine    MethodAttributes.Public, typeof(void), new Type[] { listOfClassA });Di2015NewLineclassBMethod.DefineParameter(1, ParameterAttributes.None, "list");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Write the body of ClassAMethod that calls ClassBMethodDi2015NewLineILGenerator ilgenA = classAMethod.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLineilgenA.Emit(OpCodes.Nop);Di2015NewLineilgenA.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLineilgenA.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, classBField);Di2015NewLineilgenA.Emit(OpCodes.Ldnull);Di2015NewLineilgenA.Emit(OpCodes.Callvirt, classBMethod);Di2015NewLineilgenA.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine// Create the types.Di2015NewLine// Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclassA.CreateType();Di2015NewLineclassB.CreateType();    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////Di2015NewLine// Save 3383815Di2015UniqueSeparatorset nocount on;Di2015NewLinedeclare @i int = 0;Di2015NewLinebegin transaction;Di2015NewLinewhile @i < 1000000Di2015NewLinebeginDi2015NewLine    declare @start datetime, @end datetime;Di2015NewLine    set @start = dateadd(hour, rand()*10000-5000, getdate());Di2015NewLine    set @end = dateadd(hour, rand()*100, @start)Di2015NewLine    insert into Appointments (Start, [End], Location)Di2015NewLine    values (@start, @end, replicate('X', rand()*100));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    declare @appointmentID int = scope_identity();Di2015NewLine    declare @atendees int = rand() * 10.00 + 1.00;Di2015NewLine    while @atendees > 0Di2015NewLine    beginDi2015NewLine        insert into AppointmentRoles (AppointmentID, PersonOrGroupID, Role)Di2015NewLine        values (@appointmentID, @atendees*100 + rand()*100, rand()*10);Di2015NewLine        set @atendees -= 1;Di2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    declare @notes int = rand()*3.00;Di2015NewLine    while @notes > 0Di2015NewLine    beginDi2015NewLine        insert into AppointmentNotes (AppointmentID, NoteID, Note)Di2015NewLine        values (@appointmentID, @notes, replicate ('Y', rand()*1000));Di2015NewLine        set @notes -= 1;Di2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    set @i += 1;Di2015NewLine    if @i % 10000 = 0Di2015NewLine    beginDi2015NewLine        commit;Di2015NewLine        raiserror (N'Added %i appointments...', 0, 1, @i);Di2015NewLine        begin transaction;Di2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLinecommit;Di2015NewLinegoDi2015NewLine

3384334Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate class SearchBoundDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string ArrayName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int SubArrayLength { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string StartBound { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int StartOffset { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string EndBound { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Di2015NewLine    // NOTE: I used FireFox to determine the encoding that was used.Di2015NewLine    // Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<string> lines = new List<string>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Step 1 - Download the file and dump all the lines of the file to the list.Di2015NewLine    var request = WebRequest.Create("http://skema.ku.dk/life1011/js/filter.js");Di2015NewLine    using (var response = request.GetResponse())Di2015NewLine    using(var stream = response.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine    using(var reader = new StreamReader(stream, Encoding.GetEncoding("ISO-8859-1")))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string line = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while ((line = reader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lines.Add(line.Trim());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Download Complete.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var deptArrayBounds = new SearchBoundDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ArrayName = "deptarray",                    // The name of the JS array.Di2015NewLine        SubArrayLength = 2,                         // In the JS, the sub array is defined as "new Array(X)" and should always be X+1 here.Di2015NewLine        StartBound = "deptarray[i] = new Array(1);",// The line that should *start* searching for the array values.Di2015NewLine        StartOffset = 1,                            // The StartBound + some number line to start searching the array values.Di2015NewLine                                                    // For example: the next line might be a '}' so we'd want to skip that line.Di2015NewLine        EndBound = "deptarray.sort();"              // The line to stop searching.Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var zoneArrayBounds = new SearchBoundDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ArrayName = "zonearray",Di2015NewLine        SubArrayLength = 2,Di2015NewLine        StartBound = "zonearray[i] = new Array(1);",Di2015NewLine        StartOffset = 1,Di2015NewLine        EndBound = "zonearray.sort();"Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var staffArrayBounds = new SearchBoundDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ArrayName = "staffarray",Di2015NewLine        SubArrayLength = 3,Di2015NewLine        StartBound = "staffarray[i] = new Array(2);",Di2015NewLine        StartOffset = 1,Di2015NewLine        EndBound = "staffarray.sort();"Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<string[]> deptArray = GetArrayValues(lines, deptArrayBounds);Di2015NewLine    List<string[]> zoneArray = GetArrayValues(lines, zoneArrayBounds);Di2015NewLine    List<string[]> staffArray = GetArrayValues(lines, staffArrayBounds);Di2015NewLine    // ... and so on ...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // You can then use deptArray, zoneArray etc where you want...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Depts: " + deptArray.Count);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Zones: " + zoneArray.Count);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Staff: " + staffArray.Count);Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static List<string[]> GetArrayValues(List<string> lines, SearchBound bound)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<string[]> values = new List<string[]>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get the enumerator for the lines.Di2015NewLine    var enumerator = lines.GetEnumerator();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string line = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Step 1 - Find the starting bound line.Di2015NewLine    while (enumerator.MoveNext() && (line = enumerator.Current) != bound.StartBound)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Continue looping until we've found the start bound.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Step 2 - Skip to the right offset (maybe skip a line that has a '}' ).Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i <= bound.StartOffset; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        enumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Step 3 - Read each line of the array.Di2015NewLine    while ((line = enumerator.Current) != bound.EndBound)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string[] subArray = new string[bound.SubArrayLength];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Read each sub-array value.Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < bound.SubArrayLength; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Matches everything that is between an equal sign then the value Di2015NewLine            // wrapped in quotes ending with a semi-colon.Di2015NewLine            var m = Regex.Matches(line, "^(.* = \\")(.*)(\\";)$");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get the matched value.Di2015NewLine            subArray[i] = m[0].Groups[2].Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Move to the next sub-item if not the last sub-item.Di2015NewLine            if (i < bound.SubArrayLength - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                enumerator.MoveNext();Di2015NewLine                line = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Add the sub-array to the list of values.Di2015NewLine        values.Add(subArray);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Move to the next line.Di2015NewLine        if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return values;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3384514Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class DestructiveBigInteger extends BigInteger {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public DestructiveBigInteger(String value) {Di2015NewLine        super(value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BigInteger add(BigInteger val) {Di2015NewLine        return BigInteger.ONE; // add() method does not behave correctlyDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public BigInteger subtract(BigInteger val) {Di2015NewLine        throw new UnsupportedOperationException("subtract is broken");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3384992Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class BarClass {Di2015NewLine    public void BarMethod(Type t, string method) {Di2015NewLine        var methodInfo = t.GetMethod(method);Di2015NewLine        if (methodInfo != null) {Di2015NewLine            methodInfo.Invoke(null, null); //null - means calling static methodDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Foo1Class {Di2015NewLine  static public Foo1Method(){}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class Foo2Class {Di2015NewLine  static public Foo2Method(){}Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//UsageDi2015NewLinenew BarClass().BarMethod(typeof(Foo1Class), "Foo1Method");Di2015NewLinenew BarClass().BarMethod(typeof(Foo2Class), "Foo2Method");    Di2015NewLine

3385221Di2015UniqueSeparator// 1. Capture the actual pixels from a given windowDi2015NewLineSnapshot actual = Snapshot.FromRectangle(new Rectangle(0, 0, 100, 100));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 2. Load the reference/master data from a previously saved fileDi2015NewLineSnapshot expected = Snapshot.FromFile("Expected.png"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 3. Compare the actual image with the master imageDi2015NewLine//    This operation creates a difference image. Any regions which are identical in Di2015NewLine//    the actual and master images appear as black. Areas with significant Di2015NewLine//    differences are shown in other colors.Di2015NewLineSnapshot difference = actual.CompareTo(expected);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 4. Configure the snapshot verifier - It expects a black image with zero tolerancesDi2015NewLineSnapshotVerifier v = new SnapshotColorVerifier(Color.Black, new ColorDifference());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// 5. Evaluate the difference imageDi2015NewLineif (v.Verify(difference) == VerificationResult.Fail)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Log failure, and save the diff file for investigationDi2015NewLine    actual.ToFile("Actual.png", ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine    difference.ToFile("Difference.png", ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3385823Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class GmailExtract : IMailContactExtractDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private const string ContinueUrl = "https://mail.google.com/mail/?"; Di2015NewLine        private const string ExportUrl = "https://mail.google.com/mail/contacts/data/export?exportType=ALL&groupToExport=&out=GMAIL_CSV";Di2015NewLine        private const string LoginRefererUrl = "https://www.google.com/accounts/ServiceLogin?service=mail&passive=true&rm=false&continue=http%3A%2F%2Fmail.google.com%2Fmail%2F%3Fui%3Dhtml%26zy%3Dl&ltmpl=default&ltmplcache=2";Di2015NewLine        private const string LoginUrl = "https://www.google.com/accounts/ServiceLoginAuth?service=mail";Di2015NewLine        private const string UserAgent = "Mozilla/4.0 (compatible; MSIE 7.0; Windows NT 5.1)";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IMailContactExtract MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Extract( NetworkCredential credential, out MailContactList list)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bool result = false;Di2015NewLine            list = new MailContactList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DateTime jsStartDate = new DateTime(1970, 1, 1);Di2015NewLine            TimeSpan endTs = DateTime.Now.Subtract(jsStartDate);Di2015NewLine            TimeSpan startTs = DateTime.Now.AddMinutes(-2).Subtract(jsStartDate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                CookieCollection cookies = new CookieCollection();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Prepare login form dataDi2015NewLine 3386412Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Path to directory of files to compress and decompress.Di2015NewLine        string dirpath = @"c:\\users\\public\\reports";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        DirectoryInfo di = new DirectoryInfo(dirpath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Compress the directory's files.Di2015NewLine        foreach (FileInfo fi in di.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Compress(fi);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Decompress all *.gz files in the directory.Di2015NewLine        foreach (FileInfo fi in di.GetFiles("*.gz"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Decompress(fi);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Compress(FileInfo fi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the stream of the source file.Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream inFile = fi.OpenRead())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Prevent compressing hidden and Di2015NewLine            // already compressed files.Di2015NewLine            if ((File.GetAttributes(fi.FullName) Di2015NewLine                & FileAttributes.Hidden)Di2015NewLine                != FileAttributes.Hidden & fi.Extension != ".gz")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Create the compressed file.Di2015NewLine                using (FileStream outFile = Di2015NewLine                            File.Create(fi.FullName + ".gz"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    using (GZipStream Compress = Di2015NewLine                        new GZipStream(outFile, Di2015NewLine                        CompressionMode.Compress))Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // Copy the source file into Di2015NewLine                        // the compression stream.Di2015NewLine                    inFile.CopyTo(Compress);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Compressed {0} from {1} to {2} bytes.",Di2015NewLine                            fi.Name, fi.Length.ToString(), outFile.Length.ToString());Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void Decompress(FileInfo fi)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Get the stream of the source file.Di2015NewLine        using (FileStream inFile = fi.OpenRead())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Get original file extension, for exampleDi2015NewLine            // "doc" from report.doc.gz.Di2015NewLine            string curFile = fi.FullName;Di2015NewLine            string origName = curFile.Remove(curFile.Length - Di2015NewLine                    fi.Extension.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Create the decompressed file.Di2015NewLine            using (FileStream outFile = File.Create(origName))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                using (GZipStream Decompress = new GZipStream(inFile,Di2015NewLine                        CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // Copy the decompression stream Di2015NewLine                    // into the output file.Di2015NewLine                    Decompress.CopyTo(outFile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Decompressed: {0}", fi.Name);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3386855Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar group1 = new string[][] { new[] { "A", "B" }, new[] { "C", "D" }, new[] { "X", "Y" } };Di2015NewLinevar group2 = new string[][] { new[] { "X", "Y", "Z" }, new[] { "A" }, new[] { "C", "D" }, new[] { "M", "N" } };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// For each array in group1, check if it has matching array in group2, ifDi2015NewLine// it does, merge, otherwise just take the array as is.Di2015NewLinevar group1Join = from g1 in group1Di2015NewLine                 let match = group2.SingleOrDefault(g2 => g1.Intersect(g2).Any())Di2015NewLine                 select match != null ? g1.Union(match) : g1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Take all the group2 arrays that don't have a matching array in group1 andDi2015NewLine// thus were ignored in the first query.Di2015NewLinevar group2Leftovers = from IEnumerable<string> g2 in group2Di2015NewLine                      where !group1.Any(g1 => g2.Intersect(g1).Any())Di2015NewLine                      select g2;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar all = group1Join.Concat(group2Leftovers);Di2015NewLine

3392879Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ZurgDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    static readonly Toy[] toys = new Toy[]{Di2015NewLine        new Toy("Buzz", 5),Di2015NewLine        new Toy("Woody", 10),Di2015NewLine        new Toy("Rex", 20),Di2015NewLine        new Toy("Ham", 25),Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    static readonly int totalTorch = 60;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(Go(new State(toys, new Toy[0], totalTorch, "")).Message);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static State Go(State original)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      var final = (from first in original.StartDi2015NewLine                   from second in original.StartDi2015NewLine                   where first != secondDi2015NewLine                   let pair = new Toy[]Di2015NewLine                   {Di2015NewLine                     first,Di2015NewLine                     secondDi2015NewLine                   }Di2015NewLine                   let flashlight = original.Flashlight - pair.Max(t => t.Time)Di2015NewLine                   select Return(new State(Di2015NewLine                     original.Start.Except(pair),Di2015NewLine                     original.Finish.Concat(pair),Di2015NewLine                     flashlight,Di2015NewLine                     original.Message + string.Format(Di2015NewLine                      "Go {0}. {1} min remaining.\\n",Di2015NewLine                      string.Join(", ", pair.Select(t => t.Name)),Di2015NewLine                      flashlight)))Di2015NewLine                   ).Aggregate((oldmax, cur) => cur.Flashlight > oldmax.Flashlight ? cur : oldmax);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return final;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static State Return(State original)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (!original.Start.Any())Di2015NewLine        return original;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      var final = (from toy in original.FinishDi2015NewLine                   let flashlight = original.Flashlight - toy.TimeDi2015NewLine                   let toyColl = new Toy[] { toy }Di2015NewLine                   select Go(new State(Di2015NewLine                     original.Start.Concat(toyColl),Di2015NewLine                     original.Finish.Except(toyColl),Di2015NewLine                     flashlight,Di2015NewLine                     original.Message + string.Format(Di2015NewLine                      "Return {0}. {1} min remaining.\\n",Di2015NewLine                      toy.Name,Di2015NewLine                      flashlight)))Di2015NewLine                   ).Aggregate((oldmax, cur) => cur.Flashlight > oldmax.Flashlight ? cur : oldmax);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      return final;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public class ToyDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Time { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Toy(string name, int time)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Name = name;Di2015NewLine      Time = time;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public class StateDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    public Toy[] Start { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public Toy[] Finish { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public int Flashlight { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Message { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public State(IEnumerable<Toy> start, IEnumerable<Toy> finish, int flashlight, string message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Start = start.ToArray();Di2015NewLine      Finish = finish.ToArray();Di2015NewLine      Flashlight = flashlight;Di2015NewLine      Message = message;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3395619Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class TcpDataTransportClient : IDataTransportServiceDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const string TCP_ADDRESS_SETTING = "tcpaddress";Di2015NewLine    private const string TCP_PORT_SETTING = "tcpport";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Dictionary<string, object> settings = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine    private IDataEncapsulator dataEncapsulator;Di2015NewLine    private IDataCollector dataCollector;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Socket client;Di2015NewLine    private SocketAsyncEventArgs clientArgs;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event DataReceivedHandler OnDataReceived;Di2015NewLine    public event DataSentHandler OnDataSent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    AutoResetEvent clientDataSent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    AutoResetEvent clientConnected = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TcpDataTransportClient()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Dictionary<string, object> SettingsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.settings;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.settings = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IDataEncapsulator DataEncapsulatorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return this.dataEncapsulator;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        setDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.dataEncapsulator = value;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Start(IDataCollector dataCollector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.dataCollector = dataCollector;Di2015NewLine        clientArgs = new SocketAsyncEventArgs();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        client = new Socket(AddressFamily.InterNetwork, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLine        clientArgs.Completed += clientArgs_Completed;Di2015NewLine        clientArgs.UserToken = client;            Di2015NewLine        clientArgs.RemoteEndPoint = GetIPEndPoint();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        client.ConnectAsync(clientArgs);Di2015NewLine        clientConnected.WaitOne();            Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private IPEndPoint GetIPEndPoint()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IPAddress ipAddress;Di2015NewLine        int tcpPort;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!IPAddress.TryParse(settings[TCP_ADDRESS_SETTING].ToString(), out ipAddress))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(String.Format("Invalid setting for IP Address: '{0}'", TCP_ADDRESS_SETTING));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!int.TryParse(settings[TCP_PORT_SETTING].ToString(), out tcpPort))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException(String.Format("Invalid setting for TCP Port: '{0}'", TCP_PORT_SETTING));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return new IPEndPoint(ipAddress, tcpPort);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void clientArgs_Completed(object sender, SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (e.LastOperation)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case SocketAsyncOperation.Connect:Di2015NewLine                ProcessConnect(e);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SocketAsyncOperation.Receive:Di2015NewLine                ProcessReceive(e);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case SocketAsyncOperation.Send:Di2015NewLine                ProcessSend(e);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Invalid operation completed");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ProcessConnect(SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.SocketError != SocketError.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new SocketException((int)e.SocketError);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            clientConnected.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ProcessReceive(SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.SocketError == SocketError.Success)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var socket = e.UserToken as Socket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var response = dataCollector.Collect(e.Buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (response != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (this.OnDataReceived != null)Di2015NewLine                    this.OnDataReceived(response);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                bool willRaiseEvent = socket.ReceiveAsync(clientArgs);Di2015NewLine                if (!willRaiseEvent)Di2015NewLine                    ProcessReceive(e);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new SocketException((int)e.SocketError);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ProcessSend(SocketAsyncEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (e.SocketError == SocketError.Success)Di2015NewLine        {                Di2015NewLine            var socket = e.UserToken as Socket;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (OnDataSent != null)Di2015NewLine                OnDataSent(clientArgs.Buffer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            bool willRaiseEvent = socket.ReceiveAsync(e);Di2015NewLine            if (!willRaiseEvent)Di2015NewLine                ProcessReceive(e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            clientDataSent.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new SocketException((int)e.SocketError);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {            Di2015NewLine        client.Shutdown(SocketShutdown.Send);Di2015NewLine        client.Close();Di2015NewLine        client.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        clientArgs.Dispose();           Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Write(byte[] data)Di2015NewLine    {          Di2015NewLine        clientArgs.SetBuffer(data, 0, data.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        bool willRaiseEvent = client.SendAsync(clientArgs);Di2015NewLine        if (!willRaiseEvent)Di2015NewLine            ProcessSend(clientArgs);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        clientDataSent.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3398265Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Example();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic BlockingCollection<Tuple<int, int, string>> _progressMessages = Di2015NewLine    new BlockingCollection<Tuple<int, int, string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Example()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    List<Task<int>> tasks = new List<Task<int>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; 3398756Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates new process to run and executable file, and return the outputDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="program">The name of the executable to run</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="arguments">Any parameters that are required by the executable</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="silent">Determines whether or not we output execution details</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="workingDirectory">The directory to run the application process from</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="standardErr">The standard error from the executable. String.Empty if none returned.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="standardOut">The standard output from the executable. String.Empty if none returned, or silent = true</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The application's exit code.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static int Execute(string program, string arguments, bool silent, string workingDirectory, out string standardOut, out string standardErr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        standardErr = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine        standardOut = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //sometimes it is not advisable to output the arguments e.g. passwords etcDi2015NewLine        if (!silent)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(program + " " + arguments);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Process proc = Process.GetCurrentProcess();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(workingDirectory))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //execute from the specific working directory if specifiedDi2015NewLine            proc.StartInfo.WorkingDirectory = workingDirectory;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        proc.EnableRaisingEvents = true;Di2015NewLine        proc.StartInfo.FileName = program;Di2015NewLine        proc.StartInfo.Arguments = arguments;Di2015NewLine        proc.StartInfo.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLine        proc.StartInfo.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine        proc.StartInfo.RedirectStandardOutput = true;Di2015NewLine        proc.StartInfo.RedirectStandardError = true;Di2015NewLine        proc.Start();Di2015NewLine        proc.WaitForExit();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //only display the console output if not operating silentlyDi2015NewLine        if (!silent)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (proc.StandardOutput != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                standardOut = proc.StandardOutput.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(standardOut);Di2015NewLine            }     Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (proc.StandardError != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            standardErr = proc.StandardError.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(standardErr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        proc.StandardOutput.Close();Di2015NewLine        proc.StandardError.Close();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return proc.ExitCode;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3401955Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class ValidationExceptionConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        #region IValueConverter MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // From string to Di2015NewLine        public object Convert(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ValidationError error = value as ValidationError;Di2015NewLine            if (error == null)Di2015NewLine                return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Exception exception = error.Exception;Di2015NewLine            if (exception == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return error.ErrorContent;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Find the innermost exceptionDi2015NewLine                while (exception.InnerException != null)Di2015NewLine                    exception = exception.InnerException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Use it's message as outputDi2015NewLine                return exception.Message;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType, object parameter, System.Globalization.CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new NotImplementedException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3408998Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar exefile = Directory.GetFiles(".", "*.exe").First();Di2015NewLinevar fi = new FileInfo(exefile);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar dimension = (int)Math.Sqrt((fi.Length + 1d) / 4);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var bitmap = new Bitmap(dimension, dimension + 2))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //store the file length in the first pixel.Di2015NewLine    bitmap.SetPixel(0, 0, Color.FromArgb((int)fi.Length));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var buffer = new byte[fi.Length + 4 - fi.Length % 4];Di2015NewLine    Array.Copy(File.ReadAllBytes(exefile), buffer, fi.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int x = 1, y = 0;Di2015NewLine    for (var offset = 0; offset < buffer.Length; offset += 4)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var colorValue = BitConverter.ToInt32(buffer, offset);Di2015NewLine        bitmap.SetPixel(x, y, Color.FromArgb(colorValue));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x++;Di2015NewLine        if (x >= dimension)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            x = 0;Di2015NewLine            y++;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bitmap.Save(Path.ChangeExtension(exefile, ".png"), ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3408998Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar width = (int)Math.Sqrt(fi.Length * 8);Di2015NewLinewidth = width + 8 - (width % 8);Di2015NewLinevar length = (int)(fi.Length * 8 / width);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFunc<byte, int, Color> getcolor =Di2015NewLine        (b, m) => (b & m) == m ? 3410500Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ImageThingDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string FileName { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3410501Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static IEnumerable<string> GetUniqueWords(string phrase, string word, int amount)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Clean up the string and get the wordsDi2015NewLine        string[] words = Regex.Split(phrase.Replace(".","").Replace(",",""),@"\\s+");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Find the first occurrence of the desired word (spec allows)Di2015NewLine        int index = Array.IndexOf(words,word);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //We don't wrap around the edges if the word is the first, Di2015NewLine        //we won't look before if last, we won't look after, again, spec allowsDi2015NewLine        int min = (index - amount < 0) ? 0 : index - amount;Di2015NewLine        int max = (index + amount > words.Count() - 1) ? words.Count() - 1 : index + amount;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Add all the words to a list except the supplied oneDi2015NewLine        List<string> rv = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = min; i <= max; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i == index) continue;Di2015NewLine            rv.Add(words[i]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Unique-ify the resulting listDi2015NewLine        return rv.Distinct();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

CharSet.Auto)]Di2015NewLine        private static extern bool SetTimeZoneInformation([In] ref TimeZoneInformation lpTimeZoneInformation);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var regTimeZones = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey("SOFTWARE\\\\Microsoft\\\\Windows NT\\\\CurrentVersion\\\\Time Zones");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Print out all the possible time-zones.Di2015NewLine            //foreach(var subKey in regTimeZones.GetSubKeyNames())Di2015NewLine            //{Di2015NewLine            //    Console.WriteLine(subKey);Di2015NewLine            //}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var subKey = regTimeZones.GetSubKeyNames().Where(s => s == "Atlantic Standard Time").First();Di2015NewLine            string daylightName = (string)regTimeZones.OpenSubKey(subKey).GetValue("Dlt");Di2015NewLine            string standardName = (string)regTimeZones.OpenSubKey(subKey).GetValue("Std");Di2015NewLine            byte[] tzi = (byte[])regTimeZones.OpenSubKey(subKey).GetValue("TZI");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var regTzi = new RegistryTimeZoneInformation(tzi);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var tz = new TimeZoneInformation();Di2015NewLine            tz.Bias = regTzi.Bias;Di2015NewLine            tz.DaylightBias = is not recognized. Please select a valid time zone using the link below" error Di2015NewLine            //       only when the machine is *restarted*.Di2015NewLine            //       Di2015NewLine            //       You must have the following set in your app.manifest to request admin rights to write to this key.Di2015NewLine            //       <trustInfo xmlns="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:asm.v2">Di2015NewLine            //          <security>Di2015NewLine            //          <requestedPrivileges xmlns="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:asm.v3">Di2015NewLine            //              <requestedExecutionLevel level="requireAdministrator" uiAccess="false" />Di2015NewLine            //          </requestedPrivileges>Di2015NewLine            //      ...Di2015NewLine            var key = Registry.LocalMachine.OpenSubKey("SYSTEM\\\\CurrentControlSet\\\\Control\\\\TimeZoneInformation", true);Di2015NewLine            key.SetValue("TimeZoneKeyName", key.GetValue("StandardName"));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (didSet)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Success, TimeZone Set!");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (lastError == Program.ERROR_ACCESS_DENIED)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Console.WriteLine("Error: Access denied... 3411208Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class NormalizeUrl : ActionFilterAttribute {Di2015NewLine    private bool ForceHttps = false;Di2015NewLine    private bool ForceWww = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public NormalizeUrl(Di2015NewLine        bool ForceHttps,Di2015NewLine        bool ForceWww) {Di2015NewLine        this.ForceHttps = ForceHttps;Di2015NewLine        this.ForceWww = ForceWww;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnActionExecuting(Di2015NewLine        ActionExecutingContext Context) {Di2015NewLine        HttpRequestBase Request = Context.HttpContext.Request;Di2015NewLine        HttpResponseBase Response = Context.HttpContext.Response;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!Request.IsLocal) {Di2015NewLine            if (!Request.IsSecureConnection && this.ForceHttps) {   //  http://domain.com OR http://www.domain.comDi2015NewLine                if (this.ForceWww && !Request.Url.Host.Contains("www.")) {  //  http://domain.comDi2015NewLine                    Response.RedirectPermanent(new Uri(Uri.UriSchemeHttps + "://www." + Request.Url.Host + Request.Url.AbsolutePath).AbsoluteUri, true);Di2015NewLine                } else {    //  http://www.domain.comDi2015NewLine                    Response.RedirectPermanent(new Uri(Uri.UriSchemeHttps + "://" + Request.Url.Host + Request.Url.AbsolutePath).AbsoluteUri, true);Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine            } else {Di2015NewLine                if (this.ForceWww && !Request.Url.Host.Contains("www.")) {  //  http://domain.com OR https://domain.comDi2015NewLine                    Response.RedirectPermanent(new Uri(Request.Url.Scheme + "://www." + Request.Url.Host + Request.Url.AbsolutePath).AbsoluteUri, true);Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3412960Di2015UniqueSeparatorIEnumerable<int>
3412960Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<int>
3413059Di2015UniqueSeparatorCount == 1
3413059Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (sLeft.Count > 1 && sRight.Count == 0)
3413059Di2015UniqueSeparatorsRight.Count == 0
3413059Di2015UniqueSeparatorelse
3413059Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<int> list = new List<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinewhile (sLeft.Count > 0 && sRight.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (sLeft[0] <= sRight[0])Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list.Add(sLeft[0]);Di2015NewLine        sLeft.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        list.Add(sRight[0]);Di2015NewLine        sRight.RemoveAt(0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// one of these two is already empty; the other is in sorted order...Di2015NewLinelist.AddRange(sLeft);Di2015NewLinelist.AddRange(sRight);Di2015NewLinereturn list;Di2015NewLine

3414692Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static T FindVisualChildByName<T>(DependencyObject parent, string name) where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < VisualTreeHelper.GetChildrenCount(parent); i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var child = VisualTreeHelper.GetChild(parent, i);Di2015NewLine            string controlName = child.GetValue(Control.NameProperty) as string;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (controlName == name)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return child as T;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                T result = FindVisualChildByName<T>(child, name);Di2015NewLine                if (result != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    return result;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
3414732Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string keywordPattern(string searchKeyword)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var keywords = searchKeyword.Split(',').Select(k => k.Trim()).Where(k => k != "").Select(k => Regex.Escape(k));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return @"\\b(" + string.Join("|", keywords) + @")\\b";Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string HighlightSearchKeyWords(string searchKeyword, string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var pattern = keywordPattern(searchKeyword);Di2015NewLine    Regex exp = new Regex(pattern, RegexOptions.IgnoreCase | RegexOptions.Singleline);Di2015NewLine    return exp.Replace(text, @"<span class=""search-highlight"">$0</span>");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3414970Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing Castle.DynamicProxy;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MixinFactory {Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a mixin by comining all the interfaces implemented by objects array.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="objects">The objects to combine into one instance.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public static object CreateMixin(params object[] objects) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ProxyGenerator generator = new ProxyGenerator();Di2015NewLine        ProxyGenerationOptions options = new ProxyGenerationOptions();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        objects.ToList().ForEach(obj => options.AddMixinInstance(obj));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return generator.CreateClassProxy<object>(options);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Creates a dynamic proxy of type TMixin. Members that called through this interface will be delegated to the first matched instance from the objects arrayDi2015NewLine    /// It is up to the caller to make sure that objects parameter contains instances of all interfaces that TMixin implementsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="TMixin">The type of the mixin to return.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="objects">The objects that will be mixed in.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An instance of TMixin.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static TMixin CreateMixin<TMixin>(params object[] objects)Di2015NewLine    where TMixin : class {Di2015NewLine        if(objects.Any(o => o == null))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("All mixins should be non-null");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ProxyGenerator generator = new ProxyGenerator();Di2015NewLine        ProxyGenerationOptions options = new ProxyGenerationOptions();Di2015NewLine        options.Selector = new MixinSelector();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return generator.CreateInterfaceProxyWithoutTarget<TMixin>(options, objects.Select(o => new MixinInterceptor(o)).ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class MixinInterceptor : IInterceptor {Di2015NewLine    private object m_Instance;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MixinInterceptor(object obj1) {Di2015NewLine        this.m_Instance = obj1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Type ObjectType {Di2015NewLine        get {Di2015NewLine            return m_Instance.GetType();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region IInterceptor MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Intercept(IInvocation invocation) {Di2015NewLine        invocation.ReturnValue = invocation.Method.Invoke(m_Instance, invocation.Arguments);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic class MixinSelector : IInterceptorSelector{Di2015NewLine    #region IInterceptorSelector MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public IInterceptor[] SelectInterceptors(Type type, System.Reflection.MethodInfo method, IInterceptor[] interceptors) {Di2015NewLine        var matched = interceptorsDi2015NewLine            .OfType<MixinInterceptor>()Di2015NewLine            .Where(mi => method.DeclaringType.IsAssignableFrom(mi.ObjectType))Di2015NewLine            .ToArray();Di2015NewLine        if(matched.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Cannot match method " + method.Name + "on type " + method.DeclaringType.FullName + ". No interceptor for this type is defined");Di2015NewLine        return matched;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3414970Di2015UniqueSeparator    [TestMethod]Di2015NewLine    public void CreatedMixinShouldntThrow() {Di2015NewLine        ICat obj1 = new Cat();Di2015NewLine        IDog obj2 = new Dog();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var actual = MixinFactory.CreateMixin(obj1, obj2);Di2015NewLine        ((IDog)actual).Bark();Di2015NewLine        var weight = ((IDog)actual).Weight;Di2015NewLine        ((ICat)actual).Meow();Di2015NewLine        var age = ((ICat)actual).Age;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    [TestMethod]Di2015NewLine    public void CreatedGeneric3MixinShouldntThrow() {Di2015NewLine        ICat obj1 = new Cat();Di2015NewLine        IDog obj2 = new Dog();Di2015NewLine        IMouse obj3 = new Mouse();Di2015NewLine        var actual = MixinFactory.CreateMixin<ICatDogMouse>(obj1, obj2, obj3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        actual.Bark();Di2015NewLine        var weight = actual.Weight;Di2015NewLine        actual.Meow();Di2015NewLine        var age = actual.Age;Di2015NewLine        actual.Squeek();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3415886Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (resized.PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (Bitmap bmp = convertToBitonal(resized))Di2015NewLine        bmp.Save(outputFilename, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    resized.Save(outputFilename, System.Drawing.Imaging.ImageFormat.Png);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
3415886Di2015UniqueSeparatorconvertToBitonal
3415886Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Bitmap convertToBitonal(Bitmap original)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int sourceStride;Di2015NewLine    byte[] sourceBuffer = extractBytes(original, out sourceStride);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create destination bitmapDi2015NewLine    Bitmap destination = new Bitmap(original.Width, original.Height,Di2015NewLine        PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    destination.SetResolution(original.HorizontalResolution, original.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Lock destination bitmap in memoryDi2015NewLine    BitmapData destinationData = destination.LockBits(Di2015NewLine        new Rectangle(0, 0, destination.Width, destination.Height),Di2015NewLine        ImageLockMode.WriteOnly, PixelFormat.Format1bppIndexed);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Create buffer for destination bitmap bitsDi2015NewLine    int imageSize = destinationData.Stride * destinationData.Height;Di2015NewLine    byte[] destinationBuffer = new byte[imageSize];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int sourceIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    int destinationIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine    int pixelTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine    byte destinationValue = 0;Di2015NewLine    int pixelValue = 128;Di2015NewLine    int height = destination.Height;Di2015NewLine    int width = destination.Width;Di2015NewLine    int threshold = 500;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int y = 0; y < height; y++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sourceIndex = y * sourceStride;Di2015NewLine        destinationIndex = y * destinationData.Stride;Di2015NewLine        destinationValue = 0;Di2015NewLine        pixelValue = 128;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int x = 0; x < width; x++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Compute pixel brightness (i.e. total of Red, Green, and Blue values)Di2015NewLine            pixelTotal = sourceBuffer[sourceIndex + 1] + sourceBuffer[sourceIndex + 2] +Di2015NewLine                sourceBuffer[sourceIndex + 3];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (pixelTotal > threshold)Di2015NewLine                destinationValue += (byte)pixelValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (pixelValue == 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                destinationBuffer[destinationIndex] = destinationValue;Di2015NewLine                destinationIndex++;Di2015NewLine                destinationValue = 0;Di2015NewLine                pixelValue = 128;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                pixelValue >>= 1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            sourceIndex += 4;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (pixelValue != 128)Di2015NewLine            destinationBuffer[destinationIndex] = destinationValue;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Marshal.Copy(destinationBuffer, 0, destinationData.Scan0, imageSize);Di2015NewLine    destination.UnlockBits(destinationData);Di2015NewLine    return destination;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static byte[] extractBytes(Bitmap original, out int stride)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Bitmap source = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If original bitmap is not already in 32 BPP, ARGB format, then convertDi2015NewLine        if (original.PixelFormat != PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            source = new Bitmap(original.Width, original.Height, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLine            source.SetResolution(original.HorizontalResolution, original.VerticalResolution);Di2015NewLine            using (Graphics g = Graphics.FromImage(source))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                g.DrawImageUnscaled(original, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            source = original;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Lock source bitmap in memoryDi2015NewLine        BitmapData sourceData = source.LockBits(Di2015NewLine            new Rectangle(0, 0, source.Width, source.Height),Di2015NewLine            ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, PixelFormat.Format32bppArgb);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Copy image data to binary arrayDi2015NewLine        int imageSize = sourceData.Stride * sourceData.Height;Di2015NewLine        byte[] sourceBuffer = new byte[imageSize];Di2015NewLine        Marshal.Copy(sourceData.Scan0, sourceBuffer, 0, imageSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Unlock source bitmapDi2015NewLine        source.UnlockBits(sourceData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        stride = sourceData.Stride;Di2015NewLine        return sourceBuffer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finallyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (source != original)Di2015NewLine            source.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

return ReverseAsNeeded(BitConverter.GetBytes(value), littleEndian);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] GetBytes(char value, bool littleEndian)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ReverseAsNeeded(BitConverter.GetBytes(value), littleEndian);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] GetBytes(int value, bool littleEndian)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine        return ReverseAsNeeded(BitConverter.GetBytes(value), littleEndian);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] GetBytes(short value, bool littleEndian)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ReverseAsNeeded(BitConverter.GetBytes(value), littleEndian);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] GetBytes(uint value, bool littleEndian)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ReverseAsNeeded(BitConverter.GetBytes(value), littleEndian);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] GetBytes(ulong value, bool littleEndian)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ReverseAsNeeded(BitConverter.GetBytes(value), littleEndian);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static byte[] GetBytes(ushort value, bool littleEndian)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return ReverseAsNeeded(BitConverter.GetBytes(value), littleEndian);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static byte[] ReverseAsNeeded(byte[] bytes, bool wantsLittleEndian)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (wantsLittleEndian == BitConverter.IsLittleEndian)Di2015NewLine            return bytes;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            return (byte[])bytes.Reverse().ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

3419442Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic Direction GetDirection(Point a, Point b, Point c)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double theta1 = GetAngle(a, b); Di2015NewLine    double theta2 = GetAngle(b, c);Di2015NewLine    double delta = NormalizeAngle(theta2 - theta1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if ( delta == 0 )Di2015NewLine        return Direction.Straight;Di2015NewLine    else if ( delta == Math.PI )Di2015NewLine        return Direction.Backwards;Di2015NewLine    else if ( delta < Math.PI )Di2015NewLine        return Direction.Left;Di2015NewLine    else return Direction.Right;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Double GetAngle(Point p1, Point p2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Double angleFromXAxis = Math.Atan ((p2.Y - p1.Y ) / (p2.X - p1.X ) ); // where y = m * x + KDi2015NewLine    return  p2.X - p1.X < 0 ? m + Math.PI : m ); // The will go to the correct QuadrantDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate Double NormalizeAngle(Double angle)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return angle < 0 ? angle + 2 * Math.PI : angle; //This will make sure angle is [0..2PI]Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

               Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < e.NewIndex; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newList.Add(list[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            list.Remove(oldItem);Di2015NewLine            newList.Add(oldItem);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = e.NewIndex; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newList.Add(list[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Session["VerticalMenuItems"] = newList;Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //From top to bottomDi2015NewLine        if (e.OldIndex - e.NewIndex < 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            VerticalMenuItem oldItem = list[e.OldIndex];Di2015NewLine            list.Remove(oldItem);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < e.NewIndex; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newList.Add(list[i]);Di2015NewLine            }                Di2015NewLine            newList.Add(oldItem);Di2015NewLine            for (int i = e.NewIndex; i < list.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                newList.Add(list[i]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Session["VerticalMenuItems"] = newList;Di2015NewLine        }        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

InDi2015NewLine            // other words, there is (almost) zero error checking.Di2015NewLine            if (xDocument.Document != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                XElement projectElement = xDocument.Element("Project");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (projectElement != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Name = projectElement.Attribute("Name") == null ? "Untitled Project" : projectElement.Attribute("Name").Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    MessageCollection = new List<Message>Di2015NewLine                        (from message in xDocument.Element("Project").Elements("Messages")Di2015NewLine                         select new Message()Di2015NewLine                                {Di2015NewLine                                    Name = message.Attribute("Name").Value,Di2015NewLine                                    BitfieldCollection = new List<BitField>Di2015NewLine                                        (from bitField in message.Elements("Bitfields")Di2015NewLine                                            select new BitField() {High = int.Parse(bitField.Attribute("High").Value), Low = int.Parse(bitField.Attribute("Low").Value)})Di2015NewLine                                }Di2015NewLine                        );Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class MessageDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public List<BitField> BitfieldCollection = new List<BitField>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class BitFieldDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int High { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public int Low { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public List<string> ValueCollection = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3420126Di2015UniqueSeparator  public Bitmap CreateThumbnail(Bitmap RawImage)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int width = RawImage.Width;Di2015NewLine        int height = RawImage.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Size ThumbnailDimensions = new Size();Di2015NewLine        ThumbnailDimensions.Width = 100;Di2015NewLine        ThumbnailDimensions.Height = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Rectangle cropArea = new Rectangle();Di2015NewLine        if (width > height)Di2015NewLine        {               Di2015NewLine            cropArea.Width = height;Di2015NewLine            cropArea.Height = height;Di2015NewLine            cropArea.X = 0;Di2015NewLine            cropArea.Y = 0;                Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (width < height)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cropArea.Width = width;Di2015NewLine            cropArea.Height = width;Di2015NewLine            cropArea.X = 0;Di2015NewLine            cropArea.Y = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if(width != height) Bitmap thumbnail = CropImage(RawImage, cropArea);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        thumbnail = ResizeImage(thumbnail, ThumbnailDimensions);Di2015NewLine        return thumbnail;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
3420184Di2015UniqueSeparator    public void selectTreeNodeFromPath(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // set up some delimters to split our path on.Di2015NewLine        char[] delimiters = new char[] { '\\\\' };Di2015NewLine        // split the array and store the values inside a string array.Di2015NewLine        string[] pathArray = path.Split(delimiters, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine        // clean up this array.Di2015NewLine        ensurePathArrayAccuracy(ref pathArray);Di2015NewLine        // a simple celing variable.Di2015NewLine        int numberOfLvlsToProbe = pathArray.Length;Di2015NewLine        // a variable for to keep an eye on the level of the TreeNode.Di2015NewLine        int currentLevel = 0;Di2015NewLine        // this collection always get re-populated each iteration.Di2015NewLine        TreeNodeCollection globalTreeNCollection = treeDrives.Nodes;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // start iterating through the global tree node collection.Di2015NewLine            foreach (TreeNode rootNode in globalTreeNCollection)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // only set the level if the node level is less!Di2015NewLine                if (rootNode.Level < pathArray.Length)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    currentLevel = rootNode.Level;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // the 'currentLevel' variable can also be used to help index the 'pathArray' to make comparisons straightforward with current node.Di2015NewLine                    if (rootNode.Text == pathArray[currentLevel])Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // update our control variables and start again, the next level down.Di2015NewLine                        globalTreeNCollection = rootNode.Nodes;Di2015NewLine                        // once we have found the node then ...Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    }                       Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                else // this portion of code means we are at the end of the 'pathArray.'Di2015NewLine                { Di2015NewLine                    treeDrives.SelectedNode = rootNode;Di2015NewLine                    //treeDrives.SelectedNode.EnsureVisible();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // to make sure the loop ends ... we need to update the currentLevel counterDi2015NewLine                    // to allow the loop to end.Di2015NewLine                    currentLevel = numberOfLvlsToProbe;Di2015NewLine                    break;             Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // if the 'currentLevel' is less than the 'numberOfLvlsToProbe' then we needDi2015NewLine        // to keep on looping till we get to the end.Di2015NewLine        while (currentLevel < numberOfLvlsToProbe);Di2015NewLine

3424473Di2015UniqueSeparator public static Stream GetPNGBitmapStream(Image initial)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetBitmapStream(initial, "image/PNG");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Stream GetJPGBitmapStream(Image initial)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return GetBitmapStream(initial, "image/jpeg");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Stream GetBitmapStream(Image initial, string mimeType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var qualityEncoder = Encoder.Quality;Di2015NewLine        var quality = (long)90;Di2015NewLine        var ratio = new EncoderParameter(qualityEncoder, quality);Di2015NewLine        var codecParams = new EncoderParameters(1);Di2015NewLine        codecParams.Param[0] = ratio;Di2015NewLine        ImageCodecInfo[] infos = ImageCodecInfo.GetImageEncoders();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ImageCodecInfo jpegCodecInfo = null;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < infos.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (string.Compare(infos[i].MimeType, mimeType,true) == 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                jpegCodecInfo = infos[i];Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (jpegCodecInfo != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            initial.Save(ms, jpegCodecInfo, codecParams); Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream ms2 = new MemoryStream(ms.ToArray());Di2015NewLine            ms.Close();Di2015NewLine            ms.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            return ms2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

3427387Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Drawing.Imaging;Di2015NewLineusing System.Globalization;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Data;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace System.Windows.MediaDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// One-way converter from System.Drawing.Image to System.Windows.Media.ImageSourceDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    [ValueConversion(typeof(System.Drawing.Image), typeof(System.Windows.Media.ImageSource))]Di2015NewLine    public class ImageConverter : IValueConverterDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public object Convert(object value, Type targetType,Di2015NewLine            object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // empty images are empty...Di2015NewLine            if (value == null) { return null; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var image = (System.Drawing.Image)value;Di2015NewLine            // Winforms Image we want to get the WPF Image from...Di2015NewLine            var bitmap = new System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage();Di2015NewLine            bitmap.BeginInit();Di2015NewLine            MemoryStream memoryStream = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine            // Save to a memory stream...Di2015NewLine            image.Save(memoryStream, ImageFormat.Bmp);Di2015NewLine            // Rewind the stream...Di2015NewLine            memoryStream.Seek(0, System.IO.SeekOrigin.Begin);Di2015NewLine            bitmap.StreamSource = memoryStream;Di2015NewLine            bitmap.EndInit();Di2015NewLine            return bitmap;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public object ConvertBack(object value, Type targetType,Di2015NewLine            object parameter, CultureInfo culture)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
